# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-104">Entitätsdefinitionen für Typen vertraulicher Informationstypen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-105">Die Verhinderung von Datenverlust (Data Loss Prevention, DLP) im Compliance Center umfasst viele vertrauliche Informationstypen, die Sie in ihren DLP-Richtlinien verwenden können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-106">Dieses Thema enthält eine Liste aller dieser vertraulichen Informationstypen und zeigt, was eine DLP-Richtlinie sucht, wenn sie den jeweiligen Typen erkennt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-107">Ein vertraulicher Informationstyp wird durch ein Muster definiert, das durch einen regulären Ausdruck oder eine Funktion identifiziert werden kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-108">Darüber hinaus können auch belegende Hinweise wie Schlüsselwörter oder Prüfsummen zum Identifizieren eines Typs vertraulicher Informationen verwendet werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-109">Beim Auswertungsprozess können auch die Zuverlässigkeitsstufe und die Näherung herangezogen werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-110">Für Typen vertraulicher Informationen ist eines der folgenden Abonnements erforderlich:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-113">ABA-Routingnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-113">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-114">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-114">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-115">neun Ziffern, die in einem formatierten oder unformatierten Muster vorliegen können</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-115">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-116">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-116">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-117">Formatiert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-117">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-118">vier Ziffern, beginnend mit 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 oder 8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-118">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-119">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-119">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-120">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-120">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-121">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-121">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-122">eine Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-122">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-123">Unformatiert: neun aufeinanderfolgende Ziffern, beginnend mit 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 oder 8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-123">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-124">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-125">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-125">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-126">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-127">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-127">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-128">Die Funktion Func_aba_routing findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-128">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-129">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_ABA_Routing wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-129">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- ABA Routing Number -->
<Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-149">Argentinische nationale Identitätsnummer (DNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-149">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-150">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-151">Acht Ziffern, durch Punkte getrennt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-151">Eight digits separated by periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-152">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-153">Acht Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-153">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-154">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-154">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-155">einen Zeitraum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-155">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-156">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-156">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-157">einen Zeitraum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-157">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-158">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-158">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-159">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-159">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-160">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-160">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-161">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-161">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-162">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-162">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-163">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_argentina_national_id findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-163">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-164">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_argentina_national_id wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-164">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-176">Australische Bankkontennummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-176">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-177">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-178">sechs bis zehn Ziffern mit oder ohne Bank Status Filialnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-178">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-179">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-180">Die Kontonummer beträgt sechs bis zehn Ziffern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-180">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-181">Australische Bankleitzahl:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-181">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-182">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-182">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-183">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-183">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-184">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-184">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-185">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-185">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-186">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-186">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-187">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-187">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-188">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-188">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-189">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_australia_bank_account_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-189">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-190">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_australia_bank_account_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-190">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-191">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-191">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-192">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-192">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-193">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_australia_bank_account_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-193">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-194">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_australia_bank_account_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-194">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-210">Australische Geschäftsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-210">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-211">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-211">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-212">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-212">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-213">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-213">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-214">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-214">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-215">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-215">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-216">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-216">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-217">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-217">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-218">11 Ziffern mit optionalen Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-218">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-219">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-219">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-220">11 Ziffern mit optionalen Trennzeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-220">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-221">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-221">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-222">ein optionaler Bindestrich oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-222">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-223">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-223">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-224">ein optionaler Bindestrich oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-224">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-225">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-225">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-226">ein optionaler Bindestrich oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-226">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-227">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-227">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-228">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-229">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-229">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-230">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-231">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-231">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-232">Die Funktion Func_australian_business_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-232">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-233">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_australian_business_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-233">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-234">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-234">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-235">Die Funktion Func_australian_business_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-235">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-245">Australische Firmennummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-245">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-246">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-246">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-247">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-247">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-248">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-248">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-249">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-249">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-250">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-250">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-251">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-251">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-252">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-252">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-253">neun Ziffern mit Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-253">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-254">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-254">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-255">neun Ziffern mit Trennzeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-255">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-256">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-256">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-257">ein Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-257">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-258">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-258">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-259">ein Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-259">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-260">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-260">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-261">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-262">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-262">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-263">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-264">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-264">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-265">Die Funktion Func_Australian_Company_Number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-265">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-266">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_Australian_Company_Number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-266">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-267">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 65 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-267">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-268">Die Funktion Func_Australian_Company_Number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-268">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-278">Australische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-278">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-279">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-279">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-280">neun Buchstaben und Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-280">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-281">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-282">neun Buchstaben und Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-282">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-283">zwei Ziffern oder Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-283">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-284">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-284">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-285">fünf Ziffern oder Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-285">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-286">ODER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-286">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-287">1 bis 2 optionale Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-287">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-288">vier bis neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-288">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-289">ODER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-289">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-290">neun Ziffern oder Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-290">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-291">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-292">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-292">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-293">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-294">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-294">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-295">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_australia_drivers_license_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-295">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-296">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-296">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-297">Es wurde kein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-297">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-397">Australische Kranken Kontonummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-397">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-398">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-399">10-11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-399">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-400">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-401">10-11 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-401">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-402">die erste Ziffer liegt im Bereich 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-402">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-403">Neunte Ziffer ist eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-403">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-404">Zehnte Ziffer ist die Ausgabe Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-404">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-405">elfte Ziffer (optional) ist die einzelne Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-405">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-406">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-407">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-407">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-408">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-409">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-409">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-410">Die Funktion Func_australian_medical_account_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-410">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-411">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-411">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-412">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-412">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-415">bank account details</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-415">bank account details</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-417">mortgage account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-417">mortgage account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-418">bank payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-418">bank payments</span></span>

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-424">Australische Passport-Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-424">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-425">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-426">Ein Buchstabe gefolgt von sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-426">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-427">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-428">Ein Buchstabe (Groß-/Kleinschreibung irrelevant) gefolgt von sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-428">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-429">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-430">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-430">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-431">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-432">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-432">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-433">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_australia_passport_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-433">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-434">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_passport oder Keyword_australia_passport_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-434">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-468">Australische Steuerdatei Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-468">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-469">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-470">acht bis neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-470">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-471">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-472">acht bis neun Ziffern werden in der Regel mit Leerzeichen wie folgt dargestellt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-472">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-473">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-473">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-474">ein optionaler Raum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-474">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-475">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-475">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-476">ein optionaler Raum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-476">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-477">zwei bis drei Ziffern, wobei die letzte Ziffer eine Prüfziffer ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-477">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-478">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-478">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-479">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-479">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-480">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-480">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-481">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-481">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-482">Die Funktion Func_australian_tax_file_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-482">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-483">Es wurde kein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number oder Keyword_number_exclusions gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-483">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-484">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-484">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-496">Österreichische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-496">Austria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-497">Diese Typen Entität für vertrauliche Informationen ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp für den EU-Führerscheinnummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-497">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-498">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-498">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-499">acht Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-499">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-500">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-500">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-501">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-501">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-502">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-503">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-503">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-504">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-505">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-505">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-506">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-506">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-507">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-507">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-524">Österreich-Personalausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-524">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-525">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-525">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-526">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-526">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-527">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-527">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-528">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-528">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-529">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-529">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-530">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-530">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-531">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-531">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-532">Eine Kombination aus Buchstaben, Ziffern und Sonderzeichen mit einer 24 Zeichen Länge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-532">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-533">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-533">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-534">24 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-534">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-535">22 Buchstaben (Unterscheidung nach Groß-/Kleinschreibung), Ziffern, umgekehrte Schrägstriche oder Pluszeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-535">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-536">zwei Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet), Ziffern, Backslashes, Schrägstriche, Pluszeichen oder gleich Zeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-536">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-537">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-537">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-538">Nicht zutreffend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-538">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-539">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-539">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-540">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-540">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-541">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-541">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-542">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-542">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-543">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-543">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-544">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-544">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-546">national id</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-548">Österreichische Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-548">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-549">Diese Typen Entität für vertrauliche Informationen ist nur im sensitiveinformation-Typ der EU-Passport-Nummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-549">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-550">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-550">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-551">Ein Buchstabe, gefolgt von einem optionalen Leerzeichen und sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-551">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-552">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-552">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-553">Eine Kombination aus einem Buchstaben, sieben Ziffern und einem Leerzeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-553">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-554">ein Buchstabe (Groß-/Kleinschreibung wird nicht berücksichtigt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-554">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-555">ein Leerzeichen (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-555">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-556">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-556">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-557">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-557">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-558">nicht zutreffend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-558">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-559">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-559">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-560">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-560">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-561">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-561">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-562">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-562">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-583">Österreichische Sozialversicherungsnummer oder gleichwertige Identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-583">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-584">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur in der Sozialversicherungsnummer der EU oder einem entsprechenden ID-vertraulichen Informationstyp verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-584">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-585">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-585">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-586">10 Ziffern im angegebenen Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-586">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-587">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-587">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-588">10 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-588">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-589">drei Ziffern, die einer Seriennummer entsprechen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-589">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-590">eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-590">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-591">sechs Ziffern, die dem Geburtsdatum entsprechen (TTMMJJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-591">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-592">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-592">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-593">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-593">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-594">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-594">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-595">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-595">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-596">Die Funktion "Func_austria_eu_</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-596">The function  \`Func_austria_eu_</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-597">_or_equivalent "sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-597">_or_equivalent\` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-598">ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-598">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-599">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-599">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-600">Die  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-600">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-616">Österreichische Steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-616">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-617">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-617">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-618">neun Ziffern mit optionalem Bindestrich und Schrägstrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-618">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-619">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-619">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-620">neun Ziffern mit optionalem Bindestrich und Schrägstrich:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-620">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-621">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-621">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-622">ein Bindestrich (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-622">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-623">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-623">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-624">Schrägstrich (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-624">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-625">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-625">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-626">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-627">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-627">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-628">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-629">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-629">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-630">Die  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-630">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-631">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-631">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-632">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 65 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-632">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-633">Die  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-633">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-656">Österreichische Mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-656">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-657">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-657">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-658">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-658">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-659">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-659">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-660">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-660">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-661">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-661">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-662">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-662">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-663">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-663">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-664">alphanumerisches Muster mit 11 Zeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-664">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-665">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-665">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-666">alphanumerisches Muster mit 11 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-666">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-667">A oder a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-667">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-668">T oder t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-668">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-669">Optionaler Speicherplatz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-669">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-670">U oder u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-670">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-671">Optionaler Speicherplatz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-671">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-672">zwei oder drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-672">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-673">Optionaler Speicherplatz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-673">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-674">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-674">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-675">Optionaler Speicherplatz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-675">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-676">eine oder zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-676">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-677">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-677">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-678">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-678">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-679">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-679">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-680">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-680">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

```xml
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">

        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-702">Azure DocumentDB-Authentifizierungsschlüssel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-702">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-703">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-703">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-704">Die Zeichenfolge "DocumentDb" gefolgt von den Zeichen und Zeichenfolgen, die im Muster unten dargestellt werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-704">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-705">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-705">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-706">Die Zeichenfolge "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-706">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-707">Eine beliebige Kombination von zwischen 3-200 unter-oder Großbuchstaben, Ziffern, Symbolen, Sonderzeichen oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-707">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-708">Ein größer als-Symbol (>), ein Gleichheitszeichen (=), ein Anführungszeichen (") oder ein Apostroph (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-708">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-709">Eine beliebige Kombination von 86 unter-oder Großbuchstaben, Ziffern, Schrägstrich (/) oder Pluszeichen (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-709">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-710">Zwei Gleichheitszeichen (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-710">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-711">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-711">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-712">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-712">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-713">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-713">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-714">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-714">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-715">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-715">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-716">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_CommonExampleKeywords findet **keine** Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-716">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-775">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-775">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-796">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-796">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

```xml

        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />

            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-874">Azure-SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-874">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-875">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-875">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-876">Die Zeichenfolge "SIG" gefolgt von den Zeichen und Zeichenfolgen, die im Muster unten dargestellt werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-876">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-877">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-877">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-878">die Zeichenfolge "SIG"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-878">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-879">Null bis zwei Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-879">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-881">Null bis zwei Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-881">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-882">eine beliebige Kombination von zwischen 43-53 Zeichen, die klein-oder Großbuchstaben, Ziffern oder das Prozentzeichen (%)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-882">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-886">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-886">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-888">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-888">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-889">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_Regex_AzureSAS findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-889">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-897">ein Gleichheitszeichen (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-897">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-898">Null bis zwei Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-898">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>

Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-900">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-901">NET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-901">net"</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-903">die Zeichenfolge "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-903">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-904">Null bis zwei Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-904">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-905">ein Gleichheitszeichen (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-905">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-906">Null bis zwei Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-906">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-907">eine beliebige Kombination von 43 Zeichen mit unter-oder Großbuchstaben, Ziffern, Schrägstrich (/) oder Pluszeichen (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-907">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-908">ein Gleichheitszeichen (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-908">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-909">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-912">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-912">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-913">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-913">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-914">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_CommonExampleKeywords findet **keine** Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-914">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-932">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-932">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-933">die Zeichenfolge "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-933">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-934">Null bis zwei Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-934">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-935">ein Gleichheitszeichen (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-935">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-936">Null bis zwei Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-936">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-937">eine beliebige Kombination von zwischen 1-200 unter-oder Großbuchstaben, Ziffern, Symbolen, Sonderzeichen oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-937">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-938">die Zeichenfolge "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-938">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-939">Null bis zwei Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-939">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-940">ein Gleichheitszeichen (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-940">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-941">Null bis zwei Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-941">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-942">eine beliebige Kombination von 86 Zeichen mit unter-oder Großbuchstaben, Ziffern, Schrägstrich (/) oder Pluszeichen (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-942">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-943">zwei Gleichheitszeichen (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-943">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-944">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-945">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-945">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-946">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-947">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-947">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-948">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-948">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-949">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter findet **keine** Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-949">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-950">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_CommonExampleKeywords findet **keine** Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-950">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
