## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-968">Azure Storage-Kontoschlüssel (generisch)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-968">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-969">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-969">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-970">Eine beliebige Kombination von 86 unter-oder Großbuchstaben, Ziffern, den Schrägstrich (/) oder Pluszeichen (+), vorangestellt oder gefolgt von den im Muster unten beschriebenen Zeichen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-970">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-971">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-971">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-972">Null bis eine der größer als Symbol (>), Apostroph ('), Gleichheitszeichen (=), Anführungszeichen (") oder Nummernzeichen (#)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-972">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-973">eine beliebige Kombination von 86 Zeichen mit unter-oder Großbuchstaben, Ziffern, dem Schrägstrich (/) oder Pluszeichen (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-973">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-974">zwei Gleichheitszeichen (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-974">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-975">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-975">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-976">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-976">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-977">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-977">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-978">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-978">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-979">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-979">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-980">Belgische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-980">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-981">Diese Typen Entität für vertrauliche Informationen ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp für den EU-Führerscheinnummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-981">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-982">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-982">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-983">zehn Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-983">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-984">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-984">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-985">zehn Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-985">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-986">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-986">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-987">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-987">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-988">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-988">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-989">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-989">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-990">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-990">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-991">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-991">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1013">Belgische Landesnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1013">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1014">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1014">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1015">11 Ziffern und optionale Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1015">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1016">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1016">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1017">11 Ziffern plus Trennzeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1017">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1018">sechs Ziffern und zwei optionale Zeiträume im Format yy. MM. DD für das Geburtsdatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1018">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1019">Ein optionales Trennzeichen von Punkt, Bindestrich, Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1019">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1020">drei aufeinanderfolgende Ziffern (ungerade für Männer, sogar für Frauen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1020">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1021">Ein optionales Trennzeichen von Punkt, Bindestrich, Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1021">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1022">zwei Prüfziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1022">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1023">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1023">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1024">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1024">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1025">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1025">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1026">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1026">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1027">Die Funktion Func_belgium_national_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1027">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1028">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_belgium_national_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1028">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1029">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1029">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1030">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 65 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1030">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1031">Die Funktion Func_belgium_national_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1031">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1032">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1032">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1091">Belgische Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1091">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1092">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1092">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1093">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1093">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1094">zwei Buchstaben, gefolgt von sechs Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1094">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1095">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1095">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1096">zwei Buchstaben und gefolgt von sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1096">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1097">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1097">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1098">nicht zutreffend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1098">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1099">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1099">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1100">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1100">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1101">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1101">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1102">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1102">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1126">Belgische Sozialversicherungsnummer oder gleichwertige Identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1126">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1127">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur in der Sozialversicherungsnummer der EU oder einem entsprechenden ID-vertraulichen Informationstyp verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1127">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1128">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1128">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1129">11 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1129">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1130">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1130">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1131">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1131">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1132">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1132">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1133">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1133">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1134">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1134">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1135">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1135">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1136">Die  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1136">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1137">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1137">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1138">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1138">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1139">Die  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1139">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1159">Belgische Mehrwertsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1159">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1160">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1160">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1161">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1161">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1162">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1162">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1163">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1163">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1164">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1164">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1165">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1165">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1166">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1166">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1167">12-stelliges alphanumerisches Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1167">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1168">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1168">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1169">alphanumerisches Muster mit 12 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1169">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1170">ein Buchstabe b oder b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1170">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1171">ein Buchstabe e oder e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1171">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1172">eine Ziffer 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1172">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1173">eine Ziffer von 1 bis 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1173">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1174">ein optionaler Punkt oder Bindestrich oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1174">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1175">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1175">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1176">ein optionaler Punkt oder Bindestrich oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1176">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1177">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1177">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1178">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1178">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1179">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1179">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1180">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1180">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1181">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1181">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1182">Die Funktion Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1182">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1183">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1183">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1184">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1184">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1185">Die Funktion Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1185">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1186">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1186">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1187">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1187">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1190">USt-IdNr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1190">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1191">Numéro t. v. a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1191">numéro t.v.a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1192">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1192">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1193">Umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1193">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1197">Brasilien CPF Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1197">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1198">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1198">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1199">11 Ziffern, die eine Prüfziffer umfassen und die formatiert oder unformatiert sein können</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1199">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1200">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1200">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1201">Formatiert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1201">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1202">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1202">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1203">einen Zeitraum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1203">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1204">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1204">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1205">einen Zeitraum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1205">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1206">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1206">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1207">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1207">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1208">zwei Ziffern, die Prüfziffern sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1208">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1209">Unformatiert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1209">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1210">11 Ziffern, wobei die letzten beiden Ziffern Prüfziffern sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1210">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1211">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1211">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1212">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1212">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1213">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1213">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1214">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1214">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1215">Die Funktion Func_brazil_cpf sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1215">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1216">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_brazil_cpf wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1216">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1217">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1217">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1218">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1218">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1219">Die Funktion Func_brazil_cpf sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1219">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1220">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1232">Brazil legal Entity Number (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1232">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1233">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1233">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1234">14 Ziffern, die eine Registrierungsnummer, eine Zweignummer und Prüfnziffern sowie Trennzeichen umfassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1234">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1235">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1235">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1236">14 Ziffern plus Trennzeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1236">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1237">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1237">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1238">einen Zeitraum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1238">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1239">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1239">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1240">einen Zeitraum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1240">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1241">drei Ziffern (diese ersten acht Ziffern sind die Registrierungsnummer)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1241">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1242">Schrägstrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1242">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1243">vierstellige Zweigstellennummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1243">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1244">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1244">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1245">zwei Ziffern, die Prüfziffern sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1245">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1246">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1247">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1247">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1248">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1249">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1249">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1250">Die Funktion Func_brazil_cnpj sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1250">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1251">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_brazil_cnpj wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1251">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1252">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1252">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1253">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1253">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1254">Die Funktion Func_brazil_cnpj sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1254">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1255">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1255">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1277">Brasilien National Identification Card (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1277">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1278">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1278">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1279">Registro Geral (altes Format): neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1279">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1280">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (neues Format): 11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1280">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1281">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1282">Registro Geral (altes Format):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1282">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1283">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1283">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1284">einen Zeitraum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1284">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1285">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1285">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1286">einen Zeitraum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1286">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1287">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1287">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1288">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1288">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1289">eine Ziffer, die eine Prüfziffer ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1289">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1290">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (neues Format):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1290">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1291">zehn Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1291">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1292">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1292">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1293">eine Ziffer, die eine Prüfziffer ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1293">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1294">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1294">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1295">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1295">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1296">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1296">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1297">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1297">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1298">Die Funktion Func_brazil_rg sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1298">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1299">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_brazil_rg wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1299">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1300">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1300">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1301">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1301">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1302">Die Funktion Func_brazil_rg sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1302">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1303">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1303">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1314">Bulgarische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1314">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1315">Diese Typen Entität für vertrauliche Informationen ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp für den EU-Führerscheinnummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1315">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1316">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1316">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1317">neun Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1317">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1318">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1318">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1319">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1319">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1320">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1320">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1321">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1321">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1322">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1322">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1323">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1323">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1324">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1324">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1325">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1325">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1326">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1326">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_bulgaria_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1327">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1327">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1328">DL #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1328">dl#</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1344">Bulgarien Uniform Civil Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1344">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1345">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1345">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1346">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1346">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1347">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1347">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1348">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1348">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1349">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1349">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1350">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1350">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1351">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1351">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1352">zehn Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1352">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1353">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1353">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1354">zehn Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1354">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1355">sechs Ziffern, die dem Geburtsdatum entsprechen (JJMMTT)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1355">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1356">zwei Ziffern, die der Geburts Reihenfolge entsprechen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1356">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1357">eine Ziffer, die dem Geschlecht entspricht: eine gerade Ziffer für "männlich" und eine ungerade Ziffer für "weiblich".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1357">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1358">eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1358">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1359">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1360">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1360">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1361">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1362">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1362">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1363">Die  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1363">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1364">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1364">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1365">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1366">Die  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1366">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1411">Bulgarische Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1411">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1412">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1412">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1413">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1414">neun Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1414">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1415">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1415">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1416">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1416">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1417">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1418">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1418">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1419">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1420">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1420">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1421">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1421">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1422">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1422">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common`is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1439">Kanada Bank Kontonummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1439">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1440">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1441">sieben oder zwölf Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1441">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1442">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1443">Eine kanadische Kontonummer umfasst sieben oder zwölf Ziffern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1443">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1444">Eine kanadische Bankkontonummer setzt sich wie folgt zusammen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1444">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1445">fünf Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1445">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1446">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1446">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1447">drei Ziffern oder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1447">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1448">NULL "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1448">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1449">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1449">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1450">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1450">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1451">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1451">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1452">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1452">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1453">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1453">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1454">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_canada_bank_account_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1454">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1455">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_canada_bank_account_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1455">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1456">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1456">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1457">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1457">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1458">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_canada_bank_account_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1458">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1459">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_canada_bank_account_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1459">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1483">Kanadische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1483">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1484">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1485">Variiert je nach Provinz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1485">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1486">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1486">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1487">Verschiedene Muster in Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec und Saskatchewan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1487">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1488">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1488">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1489">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1489">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1490">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1490">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1491">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1491">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1492">Die Funktion Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1492">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1493">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1493">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1494">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_canada_drivers_license wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1494">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">

        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />

        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />

      </Pattern>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1630">Canada Health Service-Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1630">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1631">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1631">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1632">zehn Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1632">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1633">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1633">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1634">zehn Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1634">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1635">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1635">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1636">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1636">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1637">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1637">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1638">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1638">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1639">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_canada_health_service_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1639">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1640">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_canada_health_service_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1640">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1641">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1641">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_health_service_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1642">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1642">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1643">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1643">personal health number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1644">patient information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1644">patient information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1645">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1645">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1646">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1646">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1647">automobile accident</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1647">automobile accident</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1648">patient hospital</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1648">patient hospital</span></span>

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1652">Kanadische Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1652">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1653">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1653">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1654">zwei Großbuchstaben, gefolgt von sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1654">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1655">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1655">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1656">zwei Großbuchstaben, gefolgt von sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1656">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1657">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1657">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1658">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1658">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1659">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1659">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1660">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1660">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1661">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_canada_passport_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1661">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1662">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_canada_passport_number oder Keyword_passport wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1662">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1663">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1663">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1664">Keyword_canada_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1664">Keyword_canada_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1692">Kanadische Personal Health Identification Number (Phin)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1692">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1693">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1693">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1694">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1694">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1695">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1695">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1696">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1696">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1697">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1697">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1698">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1698">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1699">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1699">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1700">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1700">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1701">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_canada_phin findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1701">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1702">Mindestens zwei Schlüsselwörter aus Keyword_canada_phin oder Keyword_canada_provinces werden gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1702">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1735">Kanadische Sozialversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1735">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1736">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1736">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1737">neun Ziffern mit optionalen Bindestrichen oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1737">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1738">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1738">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1739">Formatiert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1739">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1740">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1740">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1741">ein Bindestrich oder ein Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1741">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1742">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1742">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1743">ein Bindestrich oder ein Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1743">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1744">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1744">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1745">Unformatiert: neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1745">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1746">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1746">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1747">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1747">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1748">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1748">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1749">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1749">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1750">Die Funktion Func_canadian_sin findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1750">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1751">Mindestens zwei dieser eine beliebige Kombination der folgenden Aktionen aus:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1751">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1752">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_sin wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1752">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1753">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_sin_collaborative wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1753">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1754">Die Funktion Func_eu_date findet ein Datum in das richtige Datumsformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1754">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1755">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1755">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1756">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1756">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1757">Die Funktion Func_unformatted_canadian_sin findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1757">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1758">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_sin wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1758">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1759">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1759">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1784">Chile Personalausweisnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1784">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1785">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1785">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1786">sieben bis acht Ziffern Plus Trennzeichen für eine Prüfziffer oder einen Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1786">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1787">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1787">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1788">sieben bis acht Ziffern Plus Trennzeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1788">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1789">1 bis 2 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1789">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1790">einen Zeitraum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1790">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1791">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1791">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1792">einen Zeitraum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1792">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1793">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1793">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1794">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1794">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1795">eine Ziffer oder ein Buchstaben (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung), bei dem es sich um eine Prüfziffer handelt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1795">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1796">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1796">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1797">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1797">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1798">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1798">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1799">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1799">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1800">Die Funktion Func_chile_id_card sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1800">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1801">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_chile_id_card wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1801">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1802">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1802">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1803">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1804">Die Funktion Func_chile_id_card sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1804">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1805">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1805">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
