## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1820">China Resident Identity Card (PRC)-Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1820">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1821">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1821">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1822">18 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1822">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1823">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1823">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1824">18 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1824">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1825">sechs Ziffern, die einen Adresscode darstellen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1825">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1826">acht Ziffern im Format JJJJMMTT, die das Geburtsdatum darstellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1826">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1827">drei Ziffern, die ein Bestellcode sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1827">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1828">eine Ziffer, die eine Prüfziffer ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1828">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1829">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1829">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1830">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1830">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1831">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1831">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1832">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1832">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1833">Die Funktion Func_china_resident_id sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1833">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1834">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_china_resident_id wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1834">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1835">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1835">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1836">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1836">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1837">Die Funktion Func_china_resident_id sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1837">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1838">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1838">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1851">Kreditkartennummern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1851">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1852">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1853">14 bis 16 Ziffern, die formatiert oder unformatiert (dddddddddddddddd) sein können und die den Luhn-Test bestehen müssen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1853">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1854">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1854">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1855">Sehr komplexe und robuste Muster, die Karten aller wichtigen Marken weltweit, einschließlich Visa, MasterCard, Discover-Karte, JCB, American Express, Geschenkgutscheine und Restaurantkarten erkennen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1855">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1856">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1856">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1857">Ja, die Luhn-Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1857">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1858">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1858">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1859">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1859">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1860">Die Funktion Func_credit_card findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1860">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1861">Eine der folgenden Bedingungen trifft zu:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1861">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1862">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_cc_verification wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1862">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1863">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_cc_name wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1863">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1864">Die Funktion Func_expiration_date findet ein Datum im richtigen Datumsformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1864">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1865">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1865">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1866">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 65 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1866">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1867">Die Funktion Func_credit_card findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1867">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-1868">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-1868">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2128">Kroatische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2128">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2129">Diese Typen Entität für vertrauliche Informationen ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp für den EU-Führerscheinnummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2129">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2130">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2130">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2131">acht Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2131">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2132">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2132">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2133">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2133">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2134">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2134">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2135">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2135">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2136">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2136">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2137">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2137">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2138">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2138">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2139">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2139">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2155">Kroatische Personalausweisnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2155">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2156">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist im vertraulichen Informationstyp "EU-nationale Identifikationsnummer" enthalten und steht als eigenständige vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität zur Verfügung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2156">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2157">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2157">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2158">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2158">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2159">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2159">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2160">neun aufeinanderfolgende Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2160">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2161">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2161">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2162">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2162">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2163">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2163">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2164">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2164">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2165">Die Funktion Func_croatia_id_card sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2165">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2166">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_croatia_id_card wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2166">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->

</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2197">Kroatische Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2197">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2198">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2198">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2199">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2199">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2200">neun Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2200">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2201">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2201">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2202">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2202">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2203">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2203">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2204">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2204">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2205">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2205">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2206">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2206">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2207">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2207">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2208">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` oder `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2208">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2226">Kroatische persönliche Identifikationsnummer (OIB)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2226">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2227">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2228">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2228">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2229">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2230">11 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2230">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2231">zehn Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2231">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2232">letzte Ziffer ist eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2232">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2233">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2234">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2234">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2235">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2236">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2236">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2237">Die Funktion Func_croatia_oib_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2237">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2238">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2238">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2239">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2239">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2240">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2240">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2241">Die Funktion Func_croatia_oib_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2241">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2242">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2242">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2273">Kroatische Sozialversicherungsnummer oder gleichwertige Kennzeichnung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2273">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2274">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur in der Sozialversicherungsnummer der EU oder einem entsprechenden ID-vertraulichen Informationstyp verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2274">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2275">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2275">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2276">11 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2276">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2277">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2277">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2278">11 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2278">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2279">zehn Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2279">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2280">eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2280">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2281">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2282">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2282">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2283">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2284">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2284">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2285">Die  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2285">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2286">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2286">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2287">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2287">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2288">Die  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2288">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2305">Zypern-Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2305">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2306">Diese Typen Entität für vertrauliche Informationen ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp für den EU-Führerscheinnummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2306">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2307">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2307">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2308">12 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2308">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2309">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2309">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2310">12 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2310">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2311">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2311">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2312">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2312">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2313">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2313">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2314">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2314">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2315">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2315">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2316">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2316">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2331">Zypern-Personalausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2331">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2332">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2332">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2333">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2333">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2334">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2334">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2335">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2335">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2336">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2336">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2337">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2337">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2338">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2338">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2339">zehn Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2339">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2340">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2340">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2341">zehn Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2341">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2342">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2342">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2343">nicht zutreffend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2343">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2344">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2344">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2345">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2345">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2346">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2346">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2347">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2347">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2356">Zypern-Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2356">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2357">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2357">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2358">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2358">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2359">ein Buchstabe, gefolgt von 6-8 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2359">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2360">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2360">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2361">ein Buchstabe, gefolgt von sechs bis acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2361">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2362">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2362">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2363">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2363">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2364">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2364">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2365">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2366">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2366">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2367">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` oder `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2367">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2393">Zyprische Steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2393">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2394">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2394">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2395">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2395">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2396">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2396">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2397">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2397">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2398">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2398">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2399">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2399">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2400">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2400">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2401">acht Ziffern und ein Buchstabe im angegebenen Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2401">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2402">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2402">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2403">acht Ziffern und ein Buchstabe:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2403">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2404">a "0" oder "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2404">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2405">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2405">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2406">ein Buchstabe (ohne Berücksichtigung der Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2406">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2407">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2407">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2408">nicht zutreffend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2408">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2409">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2409">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2410">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2410">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2411">Die  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2411">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2412">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2412">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2413">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2413">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2414">Die  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2414">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2442">Tschechische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2442">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2443">Diese Typen Entität für vertrauliche Informationen ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp für den EU-Führerscheinnummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2443">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2444">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2444">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2445">zwei Buchstaben, gefolgt von sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2445">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2446">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2446">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2447">acht Buchstaben und Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2447">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2448">zwei Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2448">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2449">ein Leerzeichen (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2449">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2450">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2450">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2451">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2451">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2452">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2452">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2453">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2453">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2454">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2454">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2455">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2455">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2456">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2456">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2473">Tschechische Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2473">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2474">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2474">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2475">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2476">acht Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2476">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2477">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2478">acht Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2478">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2479">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2480">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2480">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2481">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2482">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2482">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2483">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2483">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2484">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` oder `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2484">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2485">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2485">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2487">Pass #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2487">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2488">Pass #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2488">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2489">Passport-Nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2489">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2490">Pässe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2490">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2491">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2491">passportno</span></span>

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2503">Tschechische Personalausweisnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2503">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2504">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2504">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2505">neun Ziffern mit optionalem Schrägstrich (altes Format) zehn Ziffern mit optionalem Schrägstrich (neues Format)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2505">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2506">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2506">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2507">neun Ziffern (altes Format):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2507">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2508">sechs Ziffern, die das Geburtsdatum darstellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2508">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2509">ein optionaler Schrägstrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2509">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2510">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2510">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2511">zehn Ziffern (neues Format):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2511">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2512">sechs Ziffern, die das Geburtsdatum darstellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2512">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2513">ein optionaler Schrägstrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2513">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2514">vier Ziffern, wobei die letzte Ziffer eine Prüfziffer ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2514">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2515">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2515">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2516">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2516">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2517">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2517">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2518">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2518">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2519">Die Funktion Func_czech_id_card sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2519">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2520">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_czech_id_card wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2520">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2521">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2521">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2522">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2522">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2523">Die Funktion Func_czech_id_card_new_format sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2523">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2524">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2524">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2571">Tschechische Sozialversicherungsnummer oder gleichwertige Identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2571">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2572">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur in der Sozialversicherungsnummer der EU oder einem entsprechenden ID-vertraulichen Informationstyp verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2572">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2573">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2573">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2574">zehn Ziffern und ein Backslash im angegebenen Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2574">ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2575">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2575">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2576">zehn Ziffern und ein Backslash:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2576">ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2577">sechs Ziffern, die dem Geburtsdatum (JJMMTT) entsprechen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2577">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2578">einen umgekehrten Schrägstrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2578">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2579">drei Ziffern, die einer Seriennummer entsprechen, die Personen trennt, die am selben Datum geboren wurden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2579">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2580">eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2580">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2581">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2581">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2582">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2582">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2583">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2583">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2584">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2584">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2585">Die  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2585">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2586">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2586">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2587">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2587">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2588">Die  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2588">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2604">Dänische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2604">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2605">Diese Typen Entität für vertrauliche Informationen ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp für den EU-Führerscheinnummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2605">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2606">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2606">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2607">acht Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2607">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2608">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2608">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2609">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2609">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2610">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2610">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2611">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2611">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2612">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2612">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2613">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2613">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2614">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2614">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2615">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2615">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2632">Dänische Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2632">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2633">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2633">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2634">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2634">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2635">neun Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2635">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2636">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2636">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2637">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2637">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2638">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2638">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2639">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2639">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2640">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2640">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2641">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2641">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2642">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2642">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2643">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` oder `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2643">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2660">Dänische persönliche Identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2660">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2661">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2662">zehn Ziffern mit einem Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2662">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2663">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2664">zehn Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2664">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2665">sechs Ziffern im Format TTMMJJ, die das Geburtsdatum darstellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2665">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2666">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2666">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2667">vier Ziffern, wobei die letzte Ziffer eine Prüfziffer ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2667">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2668">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2669">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2669">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2670">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2671">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2671">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2672">Der reguläre Ausdruck Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2672">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2673">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_denmark_id wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2673">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2674">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2674">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2675">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 65 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2675">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2676">Der reguläre Ausdruck Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2676">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2677">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2677">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2749">Dänemark Sozialversicherungsnummer oder gleichwertige Kennzeichnung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2749">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2750">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität steht nur für die Sozialversicherungsnummer der EU oder für einen entsprechenden ID-vertraulichen Informationstyp zur Verfügung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2750">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2751">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2752">zehn Ziffern und ein Bindestrich im angegebenen Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2752">ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2753">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2754">zehn Ziffern und ein Bindestrich:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2754">ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2755">sechs Ziffern, die dem Geburtsdatum entsprechen (TTMMJJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2755">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2756">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2756">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2757">vier Ziffern, die einer Sequenznummer entsprechen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2757">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2758">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2758">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2759">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2759">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2760">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2760">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2761">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2761">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2762">Die  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2762">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2763">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2763">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2764">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2764">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2765">Die  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2765">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```
