## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2779">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA)-Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2779">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2780">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2781">zwei Buchstaben, gefolgt von sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2781">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2782">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2783">Das Muster muss Folgendes enthalten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2783">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2784">ein Buchstabe (ohne Berücksichtigung der Groß-/Kleinschreibung) aus dieser Reihe möglicher Buchstaben: abcdefghjklmnprstux, bei dem es sich um einen Registrant-Code handelt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2784">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2785">ein Buchstabe (ohne Berücksichtigung der Groß-/Kleinschreibung), bei dem es sich um den ersten Buchstaben des letzten namens des Registranten handelt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2785">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2786">sieben Ziffern, wobei die letzte die Prüfziffer ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2786">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2787">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2788">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2788">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2789">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2790">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2790">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2791">Die Funktion Func_dea_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2791">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2792">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2792">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2793">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2793">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2794">keine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2794">none</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2795">Estnische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2795">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2796">Diese Typen Entität für vertrauliche Informationen ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp für den EU-Führerscheinnummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2796">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2797">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2797">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2798">zwei Buchstaben, gefolgt von sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2798">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2799">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2799">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2800">zwei Buchstaben und sechs Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2800">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2801">die Buchstaben "et" (unterscheidet nicht zwischen Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2801">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2802">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2802">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2803">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2804">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2804">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2805">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2806">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2806">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2807">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2807">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2808">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2808">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2809">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2809">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2824">Estland Personal Identification Code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2824">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2825">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2825">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2826">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2826">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2827">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2827">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2828">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2828">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2829">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2829">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2830">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2830">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2831">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2831">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2832">11 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2832">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2833">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2833">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2834">11 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2834">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2835">eine Ziffer, die Geschlecht und Jahrhundert der Geburt entspricht (ungerade Zahl männlich, gerade Zahl weiblich; 1-2:19. Jahrhundert; 3-4:20th Century; 5-6:21st Century)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2835">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2836">sechs Ziffern, die dem Geburtsdatum entsprechen (JJMMTT)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2836">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2837">drei Ziffern, die einer Seriennummer entsprechen, die Personen trennt, die am gleichen Datum geboren wurden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2837">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2838">eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2838">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2839">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2840">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2840">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2841">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2842">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2842">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2843">Die  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2843">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2844">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2844">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2845">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2845">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2846">Die  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2846">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2879">Estland-Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2879">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2880">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2880">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2881">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2881">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2882">ein Buchstabe, gefolgt von sieben Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2882">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2883">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2883">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2884">ein Buchstabe, gefolgt von sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2884">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2885">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2885">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2886">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2886">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2887">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2887">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2888">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2888">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2889">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2889">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2890">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` oder `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2890">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2904">Eesti kodaniku Pass Passi Nummer passinumbrid Dokumentnummer Dokument Nr. dokumendi Nr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2904">eesti kodaniku pass passi number passinumbrid document number document no dokumendi nr</span></span>

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2905">EU-Debitkartennummern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2905">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2906">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2906">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2907">16 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2907">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2908">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2908">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2909">Sehr komplexes und robustes Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2909">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2910">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2910">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2911">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2911">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2912">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2912">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2913">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2913">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2914">Die Funktion Func_eu_debit_card findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2914">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2915">Mindestens eine der folgenden Bedingungen trifft zu:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2915">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2916">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_eu_debit_card wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2916">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2917">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_card_terms_dict wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2917">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2918">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_card_security_terms_dict wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2918">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2919">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2919">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2920">Die Funktion Func_expiration_date findet ein Datum im richtigen Datumsformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2920">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2921">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2921">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_eu_debit_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2923">Keyword_eu_debit_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2923">Keyword_eu_debit_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2924">account number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2924">account number</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_card_terms_dict"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-2929">Keyword_card_terms_dict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-2929">Keyword_card_terms_dict</span></span>

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3367">Finnland-Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3367">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3368">Diese Typen Entität für vertrauliche Informationen ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp für den EU-Führerscheinnummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3368">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3369">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3370">zehn Ziffern mit einem Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3370">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3371">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3371">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3372">zehn Ziffern mit einem Bindestrich:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3372">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3373">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3373">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3374">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3374">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3375">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3375">four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3376">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3376">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3377">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3377">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3378">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3378">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3379">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3379">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3380">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3380">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3381">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3381">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3397">Finnische Krankenversicherungsnummer in Europa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3397">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3398">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3398">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3399">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3399">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3400">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3400">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3401">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3401">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3402">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3402">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3403">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3403">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3404">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3405">20-stellige Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3405">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3406">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3407">20-stellige Zahl:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3407">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3408">zehn Ziffern – 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3408">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3409">ein optionales Leerzeichen oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3409">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3410">zehn Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3410">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3411">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3411">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3412">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3412">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3413">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3413">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3414">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3414">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3415">Der Regex-Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3415">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3416">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3416">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3434">Finnische Nationale ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3434">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3435">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3435">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3436">sechs Ziffern plus ein Zeichen, das ein Jahrhundert angibt, plus drei Ziffern und eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3436">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3437">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3437">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3438">Das Muster muss Folgendes enthalten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3438">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3439">sechs Ziffern im Format Format TTMMJJ, die ein Geburtsdatum darstellen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3439">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3440">Century-Marker (entweder "-", "+" oder "a")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3440">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3441">dreistellige persönliche Identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3441">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3442">eine Ziffer oder ein Buchstabe (ohne Beachtung der Groß-/Kleinschreibung), die eine Prüfziffer ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3442">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3443">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3444">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3444">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3445">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3446">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3446">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3447">die Funktion Func_finnish_national_id sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3447">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3448">ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_finnish_national_id wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3448">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3449">die Prüfsummen Übergabe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3449">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3450">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3450">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3451">die Funktion Func_finnish_national_id sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3451">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3452">die Prüfsummen Übergabe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3452">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3501">Finnland-Passport-Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3501">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3502">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer verfügbar und steht als eigenständige vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität zur Verfügung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3502">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3503">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3503">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3504">Kombination von neun Buchstaben und Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3504">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3505">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3505">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3506">Kombination von neun Buchstaben und Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3506">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3507">zwei Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3507">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3508">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3508">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3509">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3509">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3510">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3510">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3511">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3511">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3512">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3512">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3513">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_finland_passport_number findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3513">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3514">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_eu_passport_number_common oder Keyword_finland_passport_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3514">A keyword from Keywords_eu_passport_number_common or Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3535">Finnland Sozialversicherungsnummer oder gleichwertige Identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3535">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3536">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur in der Sozialversicherungsnummer der EU oder einem entsprechenden ID-vertraulichen Informationstyp verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3536">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3537">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3537">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3538">Eine Kombination aus 11 Zeichen im angegebenen Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3538">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3539">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3539">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3540">eine Kombination aus 11 Zeichen im angegebenen Format:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3540">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3541">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3541">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3542">eine Instanz einer der folgenden:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3542">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3543">Plus-Symbol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3543">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3544">Minuszeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3544">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3545">der Buchstabe "A" (Groß-/Kleinschreibung wird nicht berücksichtigt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3545">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3546">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3546">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3547">ein Buchstabe oder eine Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3547">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3548">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3548">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3549">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3549">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3550">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3550">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3551">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3551">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3552">Die  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3552">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3553">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3553">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3554">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3554">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3555">Die  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3555">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3579">Frankreich Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3579">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3580">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist im Sicherheits Informationstyp des EU-Führerscheins Nummer verfügbar und steht als eigenständige vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität zur Verfügung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3580">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3581">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3581">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3582">12 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3582">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3583">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3583">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3584">12 Ziffern mit Validierung, um ähnliche Muster ( z. B. französische Telefonnummern) auszuschließen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3584">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3585">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3585">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3586">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3586">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3587">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3587">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3588">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3588">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3589">die Funktion Func_french_drivers_license sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3589">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3590">mindestens eine der folgenden zutrifft zu:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3590">at least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3591">ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_french_drivers_license wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3591">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3592">die Funktion Func_eu_date findet ein Datum im richtigen Datumsformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3592">the function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3604">Französische Krankenversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3604">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3605">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3605">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3606">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3606">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3607">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3607">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3608">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3608">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3609">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3609">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3610">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3610">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3611">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3611">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3612">21-stellige Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3612">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3613">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3613">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3614">21 Ziffern Nummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3614">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3615">zehn Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3615">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3616">ein optionaler Raum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3616">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3617">zehn Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3617">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3618">ein optionaler Raum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3618">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3619">eine Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3619">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3620">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3620">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3621">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3621">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3622">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3622">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3623">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3623">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3624">der Regex-Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3624">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3625">ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3625">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3626">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3626">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3631">Nationale ID-Karte von Frankreich (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3631">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3632">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3632">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3633">12 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3633">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3634">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3634">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3635">12 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3635">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3636">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3636">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3637">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3637">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3638">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3638">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3639">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 65 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3639">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3640">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_france_cni findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3640">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3641">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3641">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3655">Frankreich-Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3655">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3656">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer verfügbar und steht als eigenständige vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität zur Verfügung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3656">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3657">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3657">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3658">neun Ziffern und Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3658">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3659">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3659">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3660">neun Ziffern und Buchstaben:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3660">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3661">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3661">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3662">zwei Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3662">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3663">fünf Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3663">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3664">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3664">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3665">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3665">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3666">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3666">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3667">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3667">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3668">Die Funktion Func_fr_passport findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3668">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3669">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_passport wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3669">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3690">Frankreich Sozialversicherungsnummer (INSEE) oder gleichwertige Identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3690">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3691">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist in der Sozialversicherungsnummer und dem äquivalenten ID-Typ für vertrauliche Informationen enthalten und steht als eigenständige vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität zur Verfügung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3691">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3692">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3693">15 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3693">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3694">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3695">Muss einem von zwei Mustern entsprechen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3695">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3696">13 Ziffern, gefolgt von einem Leerzeichen, gefolgt von zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3696">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3697">oder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3697">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3698">15 aufeinanderfolgende Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3698">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3699">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3699">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3700">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3700">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3701">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3701">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3702">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 95 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3702">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3703">Die Funktion Func_french_insee oder Func_fr_insee findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3703">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3704">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_fr_insee wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3704">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3705">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3705">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3706">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3706">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3707">Die Funktion Func_french_insee oder Func_fr_insee findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3707">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3708">Es wurde kein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_fr_insee gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3708">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3709">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3709">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3735">Frankreich Steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3735">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3736">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3736">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3737">13 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3737">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3738">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3738">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3739">13 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3739">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3740">Eine Ziffer, die 0, 1, 2 oder 3 sein muss</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3740">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3741">1 Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3741">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3742">Ein Leerzeichen (optional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3742">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3743">2 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3743">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3744">Ein Leerzeichen (optional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3744">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3745">3 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3745">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3746">Ein Leerzeichen (optional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3746">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3747">3 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3747">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3748">Ein Leerzeichen (optional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3748">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3749">3 Prüfziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3749">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3750">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3750">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3751">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3751">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3752">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3752">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3753">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3753">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3754">Die  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3754">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3755">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3755">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3756">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3756">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3757">Die  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3757">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3758">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3758">Keywords</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3761">tax id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3765">Steuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3765">tax no</span></span>

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3777">Frankreich Mehrwertsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3777">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3778">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3778">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3779">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3779">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3780">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3780">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3781">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3781">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3782">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3782">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3783">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3783">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3784">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3784">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3785">13 Zeichen alphanumerisches Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3785">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3786">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3786">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3787">13 Zeichen alphanumerisches Muster:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3787">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3788">zwei Buchstaben-fr (Groß-/Kleinschreibung wird nicht berücksichtigt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3788">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3789">ein optionales Leerzeichen oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3789">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3790">zwei Buchstaben oder Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3790">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3791">ein optionaler Raum, Punkt, Bindestrich oder Komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3791">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3792">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3792">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3793">ein optionaler Raum, Punkt, Bindestrich oder Komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3793">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3794">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3794">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3795">ein optionaler Raum, Punkt, Bindestrich oder Komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3795">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3796">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3796">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3797">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3797">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3798">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3798">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3799">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3799">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3800">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3800">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3801">Die Funktion Func_france_value_added_tax_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3801">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3802">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3802">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3803">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3804">Die Funktion Func_france_value_added_tax_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3804">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3817">Deutschland Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3817">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3818">Diese vertrauliche Informationen Typ Entität ist in der EU-Führerscheinnummer vertraulichen Informationstyp enthalten und ist als eigenständige vertrauliche Informationen Typ Entität zur Verfügung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3818">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3819">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3820">Kombination von 11 Ziffern und Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3820">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3821">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3822">11 Zahlen und Buchstaben (ohne Beachtung der Groß-/Kleinschreibung):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3822">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3823">eine Ziffer oder ein Buchstabe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3823">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3824">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3824">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3825">sechs Ziffern oder Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3825">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3826">eine Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3826">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3827">eine Ziffer oder ein Buchstabe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3827">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3828">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3829">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3829">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3830">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3831">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3831">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3832">Die Funktion Func_german_drivers_license findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3832">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3833">Mindestens eine der folgenden Bedingungen trifft zu:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3833">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3834">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_german_drivers_license_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3834">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3835">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3835">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3836">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_german_drivers_license wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3836">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3837">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3837">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
