## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3930">Deutsche Personalausweisnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3930">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3931">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3931">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3932">seit dem 1. November 2010: neun Buchstaben und Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3932">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3933">vom 1. April 1987 bis 31. Oktober 2010:10 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3933">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3934">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3934">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3935">seit dem 1. November 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3935">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3936">ein Buchstabe (Groß-/Kleinschreibung wird nicht berücksichtigt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3936">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3937">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3937">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3938">vom 1. April 1987 bis 31. Oktober 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3938">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3939">zehn Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3939">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3940">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3941">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3941">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3942">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3943">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 65 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3943">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3944">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_germany_id_card findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3944">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3945">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_germany_id_card wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3945">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3961">Deutschland Passport-Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3961">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3962">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer enthalten und steht als eigenständige vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität zur Verfügung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3962">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3963">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3963">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3964">zehn Ziffern oder Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3964">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3965">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3965">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3966">Das Muster muss Folgendes enthalten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3966">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3967">das erste Zeichen ist eine Ziffer oder ein Buchstabe aus dieser Gruppe (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3967">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3968">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3968">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3969">fünf Ziffern oder Buchstaben aus dieser Gruppe (C,-H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3969">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3970">eine Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3970">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3971">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3971">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3972">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3972">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3973">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3973">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3974">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3974">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3975">Die Funktion Func_german_passport findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3975">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3976">Ein Schlüsselwort aus `Keyword_german_passport` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3976">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3977">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3977">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3978">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3978">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3979">Die Funktion Func_german_passport_data findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3979">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3980">Ein Schlüsselwort aus `Keyword_german_passport` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3980">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3981">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3981">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3993">Deutschland Steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3993">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3994">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3994">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3995">11 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3995">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3996">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3996">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3997">11 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3997">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3998">Zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3998">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-3999">Ein optionales Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-3999">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4000">Drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4000">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4001">Ein optionales Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4001">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4002">Drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4002">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4003">Ein optionales Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4003">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4004">Zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4004">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4005">eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4005">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4006">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4006">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4007">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4007">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4008">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4008">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4009">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4009">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4010">Die  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4010">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4011">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4011">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4012">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4012">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4013">Die  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4013">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4039">Deutschland Mehrwertsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4039">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4040">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4040">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4041">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4041">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4042">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4042">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4043">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4043">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4044">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4044">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4045">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4045">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4046">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4046">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4047">11 Zeichen alphanumerisches Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4047">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4048">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4048">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4049">alphanumerisches Muster mit 11 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4049">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4050">ein Buchstabe d oder d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4050">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4051">ein Buchstabe e oder e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4051">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4052">ein optionaler Raum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4052">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4053">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4053">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4054">ein optionales Leerzeichen oder Komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4054">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4055">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4055">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4056">ein optionales Leerzeichen oder Komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4056">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4057">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4057">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4058">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4058">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4059">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4059">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4060">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4060">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4061">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4061">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4062">Die Funktion Func_germany_value_added_tax_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4062">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4063">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4063">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4064">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4064">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4065">Die Funktion Func_germany_value_added_tax_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4065">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4075">Griechenland Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4075">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4076">Diese vertrauliche Informationen Typ Entität ist in der EU-Führerscheinnummer vertraulichen Informationstyp enthalten und ist als eigenständige vertrauliche Informationen Typ Entität zur Verfügung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4076">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4077">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4077">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4078">neun Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4078">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4079">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4079">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4080">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4080">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4081">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4081">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4082">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4082">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4083">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4083">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4084">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4084">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4085">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4085">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4086">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4086">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4103">Griechenland National Ausweiskarte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4103">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4104">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4104">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4105">Kombination von 7-8 Buchstaben und Zahlen plus einem Gedankenstrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4105">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4106">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4106">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4107">Sieben Buchstaben und Zahlen (altes Format):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4107">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4108">Ein Buchstabe (jeder Buchstabe des griechischen Alphabets) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4108">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4109">Ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4109">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4110">Sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4110">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4111">Acht Buchstaben und Zahlen (neues Format):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4111">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4112">Zwei Buchstaben, deren Großbuchstabe sowohl im griechischen als auch lateinischen Alphabet (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) vorkommt </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4112">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4113">Ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4113">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4114">Sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4114">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4115">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4115">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4116">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4116">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4117">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4117">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4118">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4118">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4119">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_greece_id_card findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4119">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4120">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_greece_id_card wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4120">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4121">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 65 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4121">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4122">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_greece_id_card findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4122">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4131">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4131">ταυτότητα</span></span>

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4133">Griechenland Passport-Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4133">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4134">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4134">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4135">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4135">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4136">Zwei Buchstaben, gefolgt von sieben Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4136">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4137">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4137">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4138">Zwei Buchstaben gefolgt von sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4138">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4139">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4139">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4140">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4140">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4141">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4141">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4142">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4142">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4143">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4143">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4144">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` oder `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4144">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4161">Griechenland Steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4161">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4162">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4162">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4163">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4163">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4164">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4164">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4165">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4165">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4166">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4166">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4167">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4167">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4168">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4168">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4169">Neun Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4169">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4170">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4170">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4171">Neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4171">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4172">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4173">Nicht zutreffend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4173">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4174">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4175">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4175">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4176">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4176">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4177">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4177">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4206">Hong Kong Personalausweisnummer (HKID)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4206">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4207">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4207">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4208">Kombination aus 8-9Buchstaben und Zahlen sowie optionale Klammern um das letzte Zeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4208">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4209">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4209">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4210">Kombination aus Buchstaben 8-9 Buchstaben:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4210">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4211">1-2 Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung irrelevant) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4211">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4212">Sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4212">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4213">Das letzte Zeichen (eine Ziffer oder der Buchstabe A), bei dem es sich um die Prüfziffer handelt, die optional in Klammern eingeschlossen werden kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4213">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4214">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4215">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4215">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4216">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4217">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4217">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4218">Die Funktion Func_hong_kong_id_card sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4218">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4219">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_hong_kong_id_card wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4219">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4220">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4221">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 65 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4221">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4222">Die Funktion Func_hong_kong_id_card sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4222">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4223">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4223">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4263">Ungarische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4263">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4264">Diese Typen Entität für vertrauliche Informationen ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp für den EU-Führerscheinnummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4264">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4265">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4265">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4266">Zwei Buchstaben, gefolgt von sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4266">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4267">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4267">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4268">Zwei Buchstaben und sechs Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4268">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4269">Zwei Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4269">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4270">Sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4270">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4271">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4271">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4272">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4272">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4273">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4273">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4274">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4274">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4275">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4275">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4276">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4276">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4292">Ungarische persönliche Identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4292">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4293">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4293">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4294">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4294">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4295">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4295">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4296">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4296">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4297">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4297">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4298">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4298">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4299">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4299">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4300">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4300">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4301">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4301">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4302">11 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4302">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4303">Eine Ziffer, die dem Geschlecht entspricht (1-männlich, 2-weiblich, andere Zahlen sind auch für Bürger möglich, die vor 1900 oder Bürgern mit doppelter Staatsbürgerschaft geboren wurden)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4303">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4304">Sechs Ziffern, die dem Geburtsdatum entsprechen (JJMMTT)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4304">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4305">Drei Ziffern, die einer Seriennummer entsprechen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4305">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4306">Eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4306">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4307">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4307">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4308">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4308">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4309">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4309">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4310">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4310">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4311">Die  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4311">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4312">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4312">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4313">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4313">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4314">Die  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4314">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4325">Ungarn Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4325">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4326">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4326">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4327">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4328">Zwei Buchstaben, gefolgt von sechs oder sieben Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4328">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4329">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4330">Zwei Buchstaben, gefolgt von sechs oder sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4330">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4331">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4331">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4332">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4332">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4333">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4333">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4334">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4334">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4335">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4335">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4336">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` oder `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4336">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4353">Ungarn Sozialversicherungsnummer oder gleichwertige Identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4353">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4354">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur in der Sozialversicherungsnummer der EU oder einem entsprechenden ID-vertraulichen Informationstyp verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4354">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4355">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4355">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4356">Neun Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4356">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4357">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4357">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4358">Neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4358">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4359">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4360">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4360">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4361">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4362">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4362">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4363">Die  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4363">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4364">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4364">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4365">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4366">Die  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4366">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4386">Ungarn Steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4386">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4387">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4387">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4388">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4388">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4389">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4389">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4390">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4390">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4391">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4391">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4392">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4392">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4393">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4393">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4394">Zehn Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4394">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4395">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4395">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4396">Zehn Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4396">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4397">Eine Ziffer, die "8" sein muss</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4397">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4398">Acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4398">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4399">Eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4399">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4400">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4400">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4401">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4401">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4402">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4402">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4403">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4403">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4404">Die  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4404">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4405">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4405">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4406">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4406">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4407">Die  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4407">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4408">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4408">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4409">Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4409">Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4410">adóazonosító szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4410">adóazonosító szám</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4433">Ungarische Mehrwertsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4433">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4434">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4434">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4435">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4435">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4436">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4436">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4437">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4437">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4438">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4438">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4439">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4439">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4440">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4441">alphanumerisches Muster mit 10 Zeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4441">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4442">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4443">alphanumerisches Muster mit 10 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4443">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4444">2 Briefe-hu oder hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4444">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4445">Optionaler Speicherplatz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4445">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4446">8 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4446">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4447">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4448">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4448">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4449">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4450">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4450">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4451">Die Funktion Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4451">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4452">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4452">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4453">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4453">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4454">Die Funktion Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4454">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4468">Indische permanente Kontonummer (Pan)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4468">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4469">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4470">10 Buchstaben oder Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4470">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4471">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4472">10 Buchstaben oder Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4472">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4473">Fünf Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung irrelevant) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4473">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4474">Vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4474">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4475">Ein Buchstabe, der eine alphabetische Prüfziffer ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4475">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4476">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4476">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4477">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4477">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4478">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4478">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4479">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4479">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4480">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_india_permanent_account_number findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4480">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4481">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_india_permanent_account_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4481">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4482">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4482">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4483">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4483">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4484">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4484">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4485">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4485">Permanent Account Number</span></span>

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4487">Indische eindeutige Identifikationsnummer (Aadhaar)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4487">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4488">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4488">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4489">12 Ziffern mit optionalen Leerzeichen oder Bindestrichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4489">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4490">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4490">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4491">12 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4491">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4492">Vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4492">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4493">Eine optionales Leerzeichen oder ein Bindestrich </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4493">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4494">Vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4494">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4495">Eine optionales Leerzeichen oder ein Bindestrich </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4495">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4496">Die letzte Ziffer, die eine Prüfziffer ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4496">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4497">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4497">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4498">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4498">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4499">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4499">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4500">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4500">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4501">Die Funktion Func_india_aadhaar sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4501">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4502">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_india_aadhar wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4502">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4503">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4503">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4504">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4504">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4505">Die Funktion Func_india_aadhaar sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4505">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4506">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4506">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4507">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4507">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4508">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4508">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
