## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4513">Indonesien Personalausweisnummer (KTP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4513">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4514">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4514">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4515">16 Ziffern mit optionalen Punkten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4515">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4516">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4516">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4517">16 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4517">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4518">Zweistelliger Provinzcode </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4518">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4519">Ein Punkt (optional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4519">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4520">Zweistelliger Regency- oder Stadtcode </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4520">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4521">Zweistelliger Subdistrict-Code </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4521">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4522">Ein Punkt (optional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4522">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4523">Sechs Ziffern im Format TTMMJJ, die das Geburtsdatum angeben </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4523">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4524">Ein Punkt (optional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4524">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4525">Vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4525">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4526">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4526">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4527">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4527">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4528">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4528">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4529">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4529">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4530">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_indonesia_id_card findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4530">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4531">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_indonesia_id_card wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4531">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4532">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4532">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4533">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4533">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4534">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4534">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4535">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4535">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4536">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4536">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4537">International Banking Account Number (IBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4537">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4538">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4539">Landesvorwahl (zwei Buchstaben) plus Prüfziffern (zwei Ziffern) plus BBAN-Nummer (bis zu 30 Zeichen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4539">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4540">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4541">Das Muster muss Folgendes enthalten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4541">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4542">Landesvorwahl mit zwei Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4542">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4543">Zwei Prüfziffern (gefolgt von einem optionalen Leerzeichen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4543">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4544">1-7 Gruppen von vier Buchstaben oder Ziffern (können durch Leerzeichengetrennt werden)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4544">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4545">1 bis 3 Buchstaben oder Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4545">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4546">Das Format für jedes Land unterscheidet sich geringfügig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4546">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4547">Der Typ der IBAN-vertraulichen Informationen deckt diese 60 Länder ab:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4547">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4548">AD, AE, Al, at, AZ, BA, be, BG, BH, ch, CR, CY, CZ, de, DK, Do, EE, es, fi, FO, Fr, GB, ge, GI, GL, GR, HR, HU, IE, IL, is, IT, kW, KZ, LB, Li, lt, LU, LV, MC, MD, me, MK, Mr, MT, mu, NL, No, PL, PT, RO, RS, Sa, SE, Si, SK, SM, TN, TR, VG</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4548">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4549">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4549">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4550">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4550">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4551">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4551">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4552">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4552">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4553">Die Funktion Func_iban findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4553">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4554">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4554">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4555">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4555">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4556">Keine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4556">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4557">Internationale Klassifikation von Krankheiten (ICD-10-cm)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4557">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4558">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4558">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4559">Wörterbuch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4559">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4560">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4560">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4561">Schlüsselwort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4561">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4562">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4562">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4563">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4563">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4564">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4564">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4565">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4565">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4566">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Dictionary_icd_10_updated wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4566">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4567">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Dictionary_icd_10_codes wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4567">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4568">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4568">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4569">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Dictionary_icd_10_ aktualisiert wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4569">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4570">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4570">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4571">Ein beliebiger Ausdruck aus dem Dictionary_icd_10_updated Keyword-Wörterbuch, das auf der [internationalen Klassifikation von Krankheiten basiert, zehnte Revision, klinische Änderung (ICD-10-cm)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4571">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4572">Dieser Typ sucht nur nach dem Begriff, nicht nach den Versicherungs Codes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4572">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4573">Ein beliebiger Ausdruck aus dem Dictionary_icd_10_codes Keyword-Wörterbuch, das auf der [internationalen Klassifikation von Krankheiten basiert, zehnte Revision, klinische Änderung (ICD-10-cm)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4573">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4574">Dieser Typ sucht nur nach Versicherungs Codes, nicht nach der Beschreibung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4574">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4575">Internationale Klassifikation von Krankheiten (ICD-9-cm)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4575">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4576">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4576">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4577">Wörterbuch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4577">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4578">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4578">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4579">Schlüsselwort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4579">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4580">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4580">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4581">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4581">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4582">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4582">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4583">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4583">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4584">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Dictionary_icd_9_updated wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4584">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4586">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4586">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4587">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Dictionary_icd_9_updated wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4587">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4589">Ein beliebiger Ausdruck aus dem Dictionary_icd_9_updated Keyword-Wörterbuch, das auf der [internationalen Klassifikation von Krankheiten basiert, neunte Revision, klinische Änderung (ICD-9-cm)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4589">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4590">Dieser Typ sucht nur nach dem Begriff, nicht nach den Versicherungs Codes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4590">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4591">Ein beliebiger Ausdruck aus dem Dictionary_icd_9_codes Keyword-Wörterbuch, das auf der [internationalen Klassifikation von Krankheiten basiert, neunte Revision, klinische Änderung (ICD-9-cm)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4591">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4592">Dieser Typ sucht nur nach Versicherungs Codes, nicht nach der Beschreibung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4592">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4593">IP-Adresse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4593">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4594">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4594">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4595">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4595">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4596">Komplexes Muster, das formatierte (Punkte) und unformatierte (keine Punkte) Versionen der IPv4-Adressen angibt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4596">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4597">IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4597">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4598"> Komplexes Muster, das formatierte IPv6-Nummern angibt (schließt Doppelpunkte ein)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4598">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4599">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4599">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4600">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4600">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4601">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4601">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4602">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4602">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4603">Für IPv6 ist eine DLP-Richtlinie zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4603">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4604">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_ipv6_address findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4604">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4605">Es wurde kein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_ipaddress gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4605">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4606">Für IPv4 ist eine DLP-Richtlinie zu 95 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4606">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4607">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_ipv4_address findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4607">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4608">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_ipaddress wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4608">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4609">Für IPv6 ist eine DLP-Richtlinie zu 95 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4609">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4610">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_ipv6_address findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4610">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4611">Es wurde kein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_ipaddress gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4611">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4619">Irland Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4619">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4620">Diese Typen Entität für vertrauliche Informationen ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp für den EU-Führerscheinnummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4620">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4621">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4621">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4622">Sechs Ziffern, gefolgt von vier Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4622">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4623">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4623">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4624">Sechs Ziffern und vier Buchstaben:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4624">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4625">Sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4625">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4626">Vier Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4626">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4627">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4627">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4628">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4628">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4629">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4629">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4630">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4630">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4631">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4631">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4632">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4632">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4648">Irland Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4648">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4649">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4649">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4650">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4650">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4651">Zwei Buchstaben oder Ziffern, gefolgt von sieben Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4651">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4652">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4652">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4653">Zwei Buchstaben oder Ziffern, gefolgt von sieben Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4653">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4654">Zwei Ziffern oder Buchstaben (ohne Beachtung der Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4654">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4655">Sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4655">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4656">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4656">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4657">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4657">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4658">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4658">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4659">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4659">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4660">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4660">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4661">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` oder `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4661">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4682">Irland Personal Public Service (PPS)-Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4682">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4683">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4684">Altes Format (bis 31. Dez. 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4684">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4685">sieben Ziffern, gefolgt von 1-2 Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4685">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4686">Neues Format (1 Jan 2013 und danach):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4686">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4687">sieben Ziffern, gefolgt von zwei Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4687">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4688">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4688">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4689">Altes Format (bis 31. Dez. 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4689">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4690">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4690">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4691">1 bis 2 Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4691">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4692">Neues Format (1 Jan 2013 und danach):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4692">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4693">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4693">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4694">ein Buchstabe (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung), der eine alphabetische Prüfziffer ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4694">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4695">Ein optionaler Buchstabe im Bereich A-I oder "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4695">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4696">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4697">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4697">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4698">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4699">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4699">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4700">Die Funktion Func_ireland_pps sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4700">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4701">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4701">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4702">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4702">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4703">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 65 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4703">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4704">Die Funktion Func_ireland_pps sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4704">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4705">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4705">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4706">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4706">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4707">Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4707">Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4708">Client Identitätsdienst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4708">client identity service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4709">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4709">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4710">persönliche ID-Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4710">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4711">persönliche öffentliche Dienstnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4711">personal public service number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4712">persönlicher Dienst Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4712">personal service no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4713">phearsanta seirbhíse poiblí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4713">phearsanta seirbhíse poiblí</span></span>

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4750">Israel Bank Kontonummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4750">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4751">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4752">13 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4752">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4753">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4754">Formatiert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4754">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4755">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4755">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4756">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4756">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4757">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4757">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4758">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4758">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4759">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4759">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4760">Unformatiert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4760">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4761">	13 aufeinanderfolgende Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4761">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4762">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4762">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4763">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4763">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4764">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4764">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4765">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4765">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4766">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_israel_bank_account_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4766">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4767">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_israel_bank_account_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4767">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4768">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4768">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4769">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4769">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4770">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4770">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4771">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4771">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4772">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4772">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4773">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4773">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4774">Israelische nationale Identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4774">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4775">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4775">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4776">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4776">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4777">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4777">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4778">neun aufeinanderfolgende Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4778">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4779">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4779">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4780">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4780">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4781">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4781">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4782">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4782">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4783">Die Funktion Func_israeli_national_id_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4783">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4784">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_Israel_National_ID wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4784">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4785">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4785">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4786">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4786">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4787">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4787">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4788">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4788">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4789">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4789">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4790">Italienische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4790">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4791">Diese vertrauliche Informationen Typ Entität ist in der EU-Führerscheinnummer vertraulichen Informationstyp enthalten und ist als eigenständige vertrauliche Informationen Typ Entität zur Verfügung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4791">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4792">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4792">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4793">eine Kombination aus 10 Buchstaben und Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4793">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4794">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4794">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4795">eine Kombination aus 10 Buchstaben und Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4795">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4796">ein Buchstabe (Groß-/Kleinschreibung wird nicht berücksichtigt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4796">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4797">der Buchstabe "A" oder "V" (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4797">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4798">sieben Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet), Ziffern oder das Unterstrichzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4798">seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4799">ein Buchstabe (Groß-/Kleinschreibung wird nicht berücksichtigt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4799">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4800">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4801">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4801">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4802">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4803">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4804">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_italy_drivers_license_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4804">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4805">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4805">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4806">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4806">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4807">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4807">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4808">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4808">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4809">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4809">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4810">Steuercode Italien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4810">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4811">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4811">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4812">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4812">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4813">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4813">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4814">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4814">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4815">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4815">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4816">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4816">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4817">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4817">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4818">eine Kombination aus Buchstaben und Ziffern aus 16 Zeichen im angegebenen Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4818">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4819">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4819">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4820">Eine Kombination aus Buchstaben und Ziffern aus 16 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4820">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4821">drei Buchstaben, die den ersten drei Konsonanten im Familiennamen entsprechen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4821">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4822">drei Buchstaben, die den ersten, dritten und vierten Konsonanten im Vornamen entsprechen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4822">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4823">zwei Ziffern, die den letzten Ziffern des Geburtsjahres entsprechen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4823">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4824">ein Buchstabe, der dem Brief für den Monat der Geburt entspricht – Buchstaben werden in alphabetischer Reihenfolge verwendet, aber nur die Buchstaben a bis E, H, L, M, P, R bis T werden verwendet (der Januar ist also a und Oktober ist r).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4824">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4825">zwei Ziffern, die dem Tag des Geburtsmonats entsprechen – um zwischen den Geschlechtern zu unterscheiden, wird 40 am Tag der Geburt für Frauen hinzugefügt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4825">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4826">vier Ziffern, die der Ortskennzahl für die Gemeinde entsprechen, in der die Person geboren wurde (landesweite Codes werden für fremde Länder verwendet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4826">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4827">eine Paritäts Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4827">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4828">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4829">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4829">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4830">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4831">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4831">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4832">Die  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4832">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4833">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4833">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4834">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4834">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4835">Die  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4835">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4870">Italien Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4870">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4871">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4871">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4872">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4872">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4873">zwei Buchstaben oder Ziffern, gefolgt von sieben Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4873">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4874">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4874">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4875">zwei Buchstaben oder Ziffern, gefolgt von sieben Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4875">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4876">zwei Ziffern oder Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4876">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4877">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4877">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4878">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4878">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4879">nicht zutreffend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4879">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4880">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4880">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4881">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4881">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4882">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4882">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4883">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` oder `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4883">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4904">Italienische Mehrwertsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4904">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4905">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4905">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4906">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4906">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4907">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4907">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4908">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4908">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4909">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4909">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4910">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4910">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4911">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4911">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4912">13-stelliges alphanumerisches Muster mit optionalen Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4912">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4913">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4913">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4914">13-stelliges alphanumerisches Muster mit optionalen Trennzeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4914">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4915">I oder i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4915">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4916">T oder t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4916">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4917">Optional: Leerzeichen, Punkt, Bindestrich oder Komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4917">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4918">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4918">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4919">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4919">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4920">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4920">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4921">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4921">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4922">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4922">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4923">Die Funktion Func_italy_value_added_tax_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4923">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4924">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4924">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4925">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4925">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4926">Die Funktion Func_italy_value_added_tax_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4926">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4934">Japan Bank Kontonummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4934">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4935">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4936">sieben oder acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4936">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4937">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4938">Kontonummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4938">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4939">sieben oder acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4939">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4940">Bank Konto Zweig Code:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4940">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4941">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4941">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4942">ein Leerzeichen oder ein Bindestrich (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4942">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4943">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4943">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4944">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4945">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4945">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4946">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4947">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4947">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4948">Die Funktion Func_jp_bank_account findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4948">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4949">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_jp_bank_account wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4949">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4950">Eine der folgenden Bedingungen trifft zu:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4950">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4951">Die Funktion Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4951">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4952">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4952">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4953">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4953">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4954">Die Funktion Func_jp_bank_account findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4954">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-4955">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_jp_bank_account wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-4955">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5014">Japanische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5014">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5015">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5016">12 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5016">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5017">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5018">12 aufeinanderfolgende Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5018">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5019">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5020">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5020">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5021">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5022">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5022">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5023">Die Funktion Func_jp_drivers_license_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5023">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5024">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5024">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5052">Japan meine Nummer-Corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5052">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5053">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5053">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5054">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5054">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5055">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5055">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5056">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5056">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5057">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5057">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5058">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5058">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5059">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5059">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5060">13-stellige Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5060">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5061">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5061">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5062">13-stellige Zahl:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5062">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5063">eine Ziffer von 1 bis 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5063">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5064">12 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5064">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5065">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5065">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5066">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5066">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5067">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5067">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5068">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5068">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5069">Die Funktion Func_japanese_my_number_corporate sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5069">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5070">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5070">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5071">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5071">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5072">Die Funktion Func_japanese_my_number_corporate sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5072">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
