- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5087">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5087">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5088">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5088">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5089">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5089">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5090">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5090">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5091">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5091">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5092">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5092">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5093">12-stellige Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5093">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5094">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5094">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5095">12-stellige Zahl:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5095">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5096">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5096">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5097">ein optionaler Raum, Punkt oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5097">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5098">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5098">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5099">ein optionaler Raum, Punkt oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5099">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5100">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5100">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5101">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5101">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5102">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5102">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5103">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5103">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5104">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5104">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5105">Die Funktion Func_japanese_my_number_personal sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5105">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5106">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5106">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5107">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 65 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5107">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5108">Die Funktion Func_japanese_my_number_personal sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5108">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5121">Japan Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5121">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5122">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5122">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5123">zwei Buchstaben, gefolgt von sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5123">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5124">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5124">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5125">zwei Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet), gefolgt von sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5125">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5126">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5126">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5127">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5127">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5128">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5128">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5129">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5129">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5130">Die Funktion Func_jp_passport findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5130">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5131">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_jp_passport wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5131">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5132">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5132">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5138">Japanische Residenz Kartennummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5138">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5139">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5139">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5140">12 Buchstaben und Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5140">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5141">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5141">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5142">12 Buchstaben und Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5142">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5143">zwei Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5143">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5144">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5144">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5145">zwei Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5145">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5146">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5146">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5147">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5147">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5148">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5148">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5149">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5149">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5150">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_jp_residence_card_number findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5150">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5151">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_jp_residence_card_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5151">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->

      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5158">Japan Resident Registrationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5158">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5159">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5159">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5160">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5160">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5161">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5161">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5162">11 aufeinanderfolgende Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5162">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5163">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5163">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5164">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5164">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5165">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5165">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5166">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5166">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5167">Die Funktion Func_jp_resident_registration_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5167">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5168">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5168">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5182">Japan Sozialversicherungsnummer (Sin)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5182">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5183">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5184">7-12 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5184">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5185">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5186">7 bis 12 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5186">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5187">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5187">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5188">ein Bindestrich (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5188">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5189">sechs Ziffern oder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5189">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5190">7-12 aufeinanderfolgende Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5190">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5191">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5192">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5192">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5193">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5194">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5194">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5195">Die Funktion Func_jp_sin findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5195">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5196">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_jp_sin wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5196">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5197">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5197">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5198">Die Funktion Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5198">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5199">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_jp_sin wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5199">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5207">Lettland Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5207">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5208">Diese Typen Entität für vertrauliche Informationen ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp für den EU-Führerscheinnummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5208">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5209">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5209">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5210">drei Buchstaben, gefolgt von sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5210">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5211">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5211">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5212">drei Buchstaben und sechs Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5212">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5213">drei Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5213">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5214">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5214">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5215">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5215">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5216">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5216">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5217">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5217">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5218">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5218">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5219">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5219">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5220">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5220">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5236">Persönlicher Code in Lettland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5236">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5237">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5238">11 Ziffern und ein optionaler Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5238">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5239">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5240">Altes Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5240">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5241">11 Ziffern und Bindestrich:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5241">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5242">sechs Ziffern, die dem Geburtsdatum entsprechen (TTMMJJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5242">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5243">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5243">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5244">eine Ziffer, die dem Jahrhundert der Geburt entspricht ("0" für das 19. Jahrhundert, "1" für das 20. Jahrhundert und "2" für das 21. Jahrhundert)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5244">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5245">vier Ziffern, nach dem Zufallsprinzip generiert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5245">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5246">Neues Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5246">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5247">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5247">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5248">Zwei Ziffern "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5248">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5249">Neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5249">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5250">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5250">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5251">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5251">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5252">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5252">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5253">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5253">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5254">Die Funktion  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` oder der Regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5254">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5255">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5255">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5256">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5256">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5257">Die Funktion  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` oder der Regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5257">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5320">Lettland Passport-Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5320">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5321">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5321">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5322">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5322">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5323">zwei Buchstaben oder Ziffern, gefolgt von sieben Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5323">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5324">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5324">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5325">zwei Buchstaben oder Ziffern, gefolgt von sieben Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5325">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5326">zwei Ziffern oder Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5326">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5327">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5327">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5328">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5328">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5329">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5329">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5330">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5330">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5331">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5331">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5332">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5332">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5333">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` oder `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5333">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5353">Litauische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5353">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5354">Diese Typen Entität für vertrauliche Informationen ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp für den EU-Führerscheinnummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5354">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5355">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5355">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5356">acht Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5356">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5357">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5357">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5358">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5358">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5359">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5360">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5360">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5361">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5362">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5362">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5363">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5363">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5364">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5364">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5380">Persönlicher Code in Litauen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5380">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5381">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5381">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5382">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5382">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5383">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5383">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5384">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5384">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5385">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5385">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5386">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5386">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5387">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5388">11 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5388">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5389">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5390">11 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5390">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5391">eine Ziffer (1-6), die dem Geschlecht der Person und dem Jahrhundert der Geburt entspricht</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5391">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5392">sechs Ziffern, die dem Geburtsdatum entsprechen (JJMMTT)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5392">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5393">drei Ziffern, die der Seriennummer des Geburtsdatums entsprechen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5393">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5394">eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5394">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5395">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5395">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5396">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5396">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5397">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5397">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5398">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5398">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5399">Die  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5399">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5400">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5400">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5401">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5401">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5402">Die  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5402">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5437">Litauen-Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5437">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5438">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5438">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5439">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5439">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5440">acht Ziffern oder Buchstaben ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5440">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5441">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5441">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5442">acht Ziffern oder Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5442">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5443">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5444">nicht zutreffend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5444">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5445">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5446">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5446">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5447">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5447">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5448">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` oder `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5448">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5465">Luxemburgische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5465">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5466">Diese Typen Entität für vertrauliche Informationen ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp für den EU-Führerscheinnummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5466">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5467">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5467">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5468">sechs Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5468">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5469">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5469">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5470">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5470">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5471">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5471">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5472">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5472">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5473">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5473">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5474">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5474">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5475">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5475">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5476">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5476">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5492">Luxemburgische nationale Identifikationsnummer (natürliche Personen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5492">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5493">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5493">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5494">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5494">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5495">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5495">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5496">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5496">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5497">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5497">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5498">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5498">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5499">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5499">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5500">13 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5500">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5501">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5501">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5502">13 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5502">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5503">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5503">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5504">zwei Prüfziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5504">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5505">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5505">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5506">ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5506">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5507">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5507">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5508">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5508">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5509">Die  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5509">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5510">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5510">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5511">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5511">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5512">Die  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5512">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5535">Luxemburg-Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5535">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5536">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5536">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5537">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5537">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5538">acht Ziffern oder Buchstaben ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5538">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5539">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5539">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5540">acht Ziffern oder Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5540">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5541">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5541">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5542">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5542">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5543">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5543">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5544">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5544">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5545">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5545">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5546">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5546">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5547">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5547">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_nation_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5548">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5548">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5553">Luxemburgische nationale Identifikationsnummer (nicht natürliche Personen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5553">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5554">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5554">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5555">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5555">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5556">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5556">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5557">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5557">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5558">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5558">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5559">ein optionaler Raum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5559">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5560">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5560">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5561">ein optionaler Raum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5561">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5562">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5562">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5563">ein optionaler Raum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5563">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5564">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5564">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5565">eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5565">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5566">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5566">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5567">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5567">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5568">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5568">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5569">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5569">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5570">Die  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5570">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5571">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5571">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5572">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5572">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5573">Die  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5573">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5613">Malaysia-Identifikationskarten Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5613">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5614">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5614">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5615">12 Ziffern mit optionalen Bindestrichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5615">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5616">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5616">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5617">12 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5617">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5618">sechs Ziffern im Format jjmmtt, die das Geburtsdatum darstellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5618">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5619">ein Bindestrich (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5619">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5620">Code mit zwei Buchstaben (Geburtsort)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5620">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5621">ein Bindestrich (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5621">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5622">drei zufällige Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5622">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5623">einstelliger Geschlechter Code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5623">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5624">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5624">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5625">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5625">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5626">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5626">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5627">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5627">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5628">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_malaysia_id_card_number findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5628">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5629">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5629">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5656">Malta-Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5656">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5657">Diese Typen Entität für vertrauliche Informationen ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp für den EU-Führerscheinnummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5657">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5658">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5659">Kombination aus zwei Zeichen und sechs Ziffern im angegebenen Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5659">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5660">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5661">Kombination aus zwei Zeichen und sechs Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5661">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5662">zwei Zeichen (Ziffern oder Buchstaben, bei denen die Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet wird)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5662">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5663">ein Leerzeichen (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5663">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5664">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5664">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5665">ein Leerzeichen (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5665">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5666">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5666">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5667">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5668">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5668">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5669">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5670">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5670">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5671">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5671">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5672">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5672">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5688">Malta-Personalausweisnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5688">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5689">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5689">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5690">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5690">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5691">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5691">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5692">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5692">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5693">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5693">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5694">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5694">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5695">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5696">sieben Ziffern, gefolgt von einem Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5696">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5697">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5698">sieben Ziffern, gefolgt von einem Buchstaben:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5698">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5699">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5699">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5700">ein Buchstabe in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (Groß-/Kleinschreibung wird nicht berücksichtigt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5700">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5701">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5702">Nicht zutreffend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5702">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5703">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5704">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5704">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5705">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5705">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5706">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5706">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5707">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 65 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5707">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5708">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5708">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5725">Malta Passport-Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5725">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5726">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5726">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5727">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5727">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5728">sieben Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5728">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5729">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5729">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5730">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5730">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5731">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5732">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5732">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5733">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5734">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5734">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5735">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5735">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5736">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` oder `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5736">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5753">Malta-Steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5753">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5754">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5755">Für maltesische Staatsangehörige:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5755">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5756">sieben Ziffern und ein Buchstabe im angegebenen Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5756">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5757">Nicht maltesische Staatsangehörige und maltesische Entitäten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5757">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5758">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5758">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5759">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5759">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5760">Maltesische Staatsangehörige: sieben Ziffern und ein Buchstabe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5760">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5761">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5761">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5762">ein Buchstabe (ohne Berücksichtigung der Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5762">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5763">Nicht maltesische Staatsangehörige und maltesische Entitäten: neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5763">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5764">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5764">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5765">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5766">Nicht zutreffend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5766">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5767">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5768">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5768">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5769">Der Regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  oder `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5769">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5770">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5770">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5771">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 65 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5771">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5772">Der Regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` oder `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5772">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5786">tax id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5788">Steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5788">tax identification number</span></span>
