## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5805">Niederländische Bürgerdienst Nummer (BSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5805">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5806">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5807">acht-neun Ziffern mit optionalen Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5807">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5808">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5809">acht bis neun Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5809">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5810">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5810">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5811">ein Leerzeichen (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5811">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5812">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5812">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5813">ein Leerzeichen (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5813">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5814">zwei-drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5814">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5815">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5815">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5816">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5816">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5817">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5817">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5818">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5818">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5819">Die Funktion Func_netherlands_bsn sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5819">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5820">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_netherlands_bsn wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5820">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5821">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5821">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5845">Niederländische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5845">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5846">Diese Typen Entität für vertrauliche Informationen ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp für den EU-Führerscheinnummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5846">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5847">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5847">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5848">zehn Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5848">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5849">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5849">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5850">zehn Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5850">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5851">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5851">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5852">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5852">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5853">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5853">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5854">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5854">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5855">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5855">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5856">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5856">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5874">Niederländische Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5874">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5875">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5875">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5876">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5876">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5877">neun Buchstaben oder Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5877">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5878">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5878">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5879">neun Buchstaben oder Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5879">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5880">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5880">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5881">nicht zutreffend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5881">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5882">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5882">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5883">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5883">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5884">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5884">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5885">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5885">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5899">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5899">information governance</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5901">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5901">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5902">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5903">neun Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5903">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5904">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5904">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5905">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5905">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5906">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5906">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5908">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5909">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5909">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5910">Die  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5910">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5911">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5911">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5912">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 65 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5912">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5913">Die  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5913">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5951">Niederländische Mehrwertsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5951">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5952">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5952">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5953">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5953">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5954">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5954">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5955">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5955">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5956">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5956">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5957">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5957">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5958">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5958">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5959">14 Zeichen alphanumerisches Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5959">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5960">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5960">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5961">alphanumerisches Muster mit 14 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5961">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5962">N oder n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5962">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5963">L oder l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5963">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5964">Optionaler Abstand, Punkt oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5964">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5965">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5965">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5966">Optionaler Abstand, Punkt oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5966">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5967">B oder b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5967">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5968">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5968">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5969">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5969">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5970">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5970">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5971">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5971">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5972">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5972">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5973">Die Funktion Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5973">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5974">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5974">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5975">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5975">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5976">Die Funktion Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5976">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5986">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5986">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5987">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5987">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5988">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5988">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5989">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5989">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5990">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5990">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5991">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5991">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5992">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5992">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5993">14-bis 16-stelliges Muster mit optionalem Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5993">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5994">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5994">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5995">14 bis 16 Ziffern Muster mit optionalem Trennzeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5995">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5996">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5996">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5997">ein optionaler Bindestrich oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5997">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5998">drei bis vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5998">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-5999">ein optionaler Bindestrich oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-5999">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6000">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6000">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6001">ein optionaler Bindestrich oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6001">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6002">zwei bis drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6002">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6003">Options Bindestrich oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6003">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6004">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6005">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6005">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6006">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6007">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6007">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6008">Die Funktion Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6008">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6010">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6010">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6011">Die Funktion Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6011">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6019">Neuseeländische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6019">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6020">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6020">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6021">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6021">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6022">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6022">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6023">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6023">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6024">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6024">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6025">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6025">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6026">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6026">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6027">alphanumerisches Muster mit acht Zeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6027">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6028">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6028">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6029">alphanumerisches Muster mit acht Zeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6029">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6030">zwei Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6030">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6031">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6031">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6032">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6032">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6033">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6033">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6034">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6034">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6035">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6035">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6036">Die Funktion Func_newzealand_driver_license_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6036">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6037">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6037">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6038">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 65 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6038">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6039">Die Funktion Func_newzealand_driver_license_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6039">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6106">New Zealand Inland Revenue Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6106">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6107">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6107">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6108">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6108">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6109">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6109">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6110">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6110">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6111">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6111">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6112">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6112">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6113">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6114">acht oder neun Ziffern mit optionalen Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6114">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6115">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6115">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6116">acht oder neun Ziffern mit optionalen Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6116">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6117">zwei oder drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6117">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6118">ein optionales Leerzeichen oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6118">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6119">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6119">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6120">ein optionales Leerzeichen oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6120">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6121">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6121">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6122">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6122">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6123">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6123">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6124">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6124">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6125">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6125">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6126">Die Funktion Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6126">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6127">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6127">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6128">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6128">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6129">Die Funktion Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6129">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6138">Neuseeländisches Gesundheitsministerium Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6138">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6139">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6139">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6140">drei Buchstaben, ein Leerzeichen (optional) und vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6140">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6141">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6141">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6142">drei Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet) ein Leerzeichen (optional) vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6142">three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6143">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6143">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6144">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6144">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6145">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6145">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6146">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6146">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6147">Die Funktion Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6147">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6148">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_nz_terms wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6148">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6149">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6149">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6156">Neuseeländische sozial wlefare Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6156">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6157">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6157">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6158">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6158">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6159">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6159">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6160">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6160">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6161">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6161">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6162">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6162">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6163">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6164">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6164">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6165">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6166">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6166">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6167">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6167">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6168">ein optionaler Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6168">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6169">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6169">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6170">ein optionaler Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6170">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6171">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6171">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6172">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6173">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6173">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6174">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6175">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6175">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6176">Die Funktion Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6176">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6177">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6177">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6178">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 65 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6178">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6179">Die Funktion Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6179">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6181">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6181">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6187">Norwegen-Identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6187">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6188">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6188">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6189">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6189">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6190">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6190">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6191">11 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6191">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6192">sechs Ziffern im Format TTMMJJ, die das Geburtsdatum darstellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6192">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6193">dreistellige Einzelnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6193">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6194">zwei Prüfziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6194">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6195">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6195">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6196">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6196">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6197">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6197">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6198">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6198">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6199">Die Funktion Func_norway_id_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6199">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6200">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_norway_id_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6200">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6201">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6201">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6202">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6202">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6203">Die Funktion Func_norway_id_numbe sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6203">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6204">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6204">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6213">Philippinische Unified Multi-Purpose Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6213">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6214">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6214">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6215">12 Ziffern, durch Bindestriche getrennt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6215">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6216">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6217">12 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6217">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6218">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6218">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6219">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6219">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6220">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6220">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6221">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6221">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6222">eine Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6222">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6223">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6223">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6224">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6224">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6225">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6225">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6226">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6226">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6227">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_philippines_unified_id findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6227">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6228">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_philippines_id wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6228">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6229">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6229">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6230">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6230">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6235">Polen-Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6235">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6236">Diese Typen Entität für vertrauliche Informationen ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp für den EU-Führerscheinnummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6236">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6237">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6238">14 Ziffern mit 2 Schrägstrichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6238">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6239">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6240">14 Ziffern und 2 Schrägstriche:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6240">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6241">fünf Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6241">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6242">Schrägstrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6242">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6243">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6243">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6244">Schrägstrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6244">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6245">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6245">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6246">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6247">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6247">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6248">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6249">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6249">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6250">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6250">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6251">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6251">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6267">Polen-Personalausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6267">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6268">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6269">drei Buchstaben und sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6269">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6270">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6270">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6271">drei Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet), gefolgt von sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6271">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6272">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6272">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6273">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6273">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6274">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6274">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6275">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6275">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6276">Die Funktion Func_polish_national_id findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6276">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6277">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6277">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6278">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6278">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6279">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6279">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6280">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6280">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6282">Numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6282">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6283">Nazwa i Numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6283">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6284">Nazwa i Nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6284">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6285">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6285">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6286">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6286">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6287">Dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6287">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6288">OS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6288">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6289">Polen-National-ID (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6289">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6290">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6290">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6291">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6291">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6292">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6292">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6293">6 Ziffern, die das Geburtsdatum im Format jjmmtt darstellen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6293">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6294">4 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6294">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6295">1 Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6295">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6296">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6296">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6297">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6297">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6298">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6298">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6299">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6299">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6300">Die Funktion Func_pesel_identification_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6300">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6301">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_pesel_identification_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6301">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6302">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6302">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6303">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6303">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6304">Die Funktion Func_pesel_identification_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6304">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6305">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6305">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6306">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6306">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6307">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6307">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6308">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6308">dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6309">dowódosobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6309">dowódosobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6310">niepowtarzalny-Numer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6310">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6311">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6311">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6312">Nr.-PESEL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6312">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6313">Nr-PESEL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6313">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6314">Numer identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6314">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6315">PESEL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6315">pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6316">tożsamości Narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6316">tożsamości narodowej</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6317">Polen-Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6317">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6318">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer enthalten und steht als eigenständige vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität zur Verfügung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6318">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6319">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6319">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6320">zwei Buchstaben und sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6320">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6321">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6321">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6322">Zwei Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung irrelevant), gefolgt von sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6322">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6323">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6323">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6324">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6324">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6325">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6325">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6326">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6326">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6327">Die Funktion Func_polish_passport_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6327">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6328">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6328">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6329">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6329">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6330">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6330">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6331">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6331">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6336">Polen REGON Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6336">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6337">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6337">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6338">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6338">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6339">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6339">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6340">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6340">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6341">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6341">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6342">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6342">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6343">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6343">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6344">neunstellige oder 14-stellige Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6344">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6345">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6345">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6346">neunstellige oder 14-stellige Zahl:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6346">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6347">neun Ziffern oder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6347">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6348">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6348">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6349">Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6349">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6350">fünf Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6350">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6351">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6351">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6352">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6352">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6353">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6353">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6354">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6354">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6355">Die Funktion Func_polish_regon_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6355">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6356">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_polish_regon_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6356">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6357">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 65 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6357">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6358">Die Funktion Func_polish_regon_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6358">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6375">Polnische Steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6375">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6376">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6376">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6377">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6377">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6378">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6378">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6379">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6379">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6380">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6380">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6381">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6381">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6382">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6382">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6383">11 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6383">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6384">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6384">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6385">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6385">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6386">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6386">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6387">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6387">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6388">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6388">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6389">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6389">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6390">Die  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6390">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6391">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6391">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6421">Portugiesische Bürgerkarten Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6421">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6422">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6422">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6423">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6423">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6424">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6424">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6425">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6425">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6426">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6426">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6427">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6427">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6428">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6428">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6429">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6429">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6430">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_portugal_citizen_card findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6430">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6431">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_portugal_citizen_card wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6431">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
