## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6451">Portugiesische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6451">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6452">Diese Typen Entität für vertrauliche Informationen ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp für den EU-Führerscheinnummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6452">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6453">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6453">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6454">zwei Buchstaben, gefolgt von sieben Zahlen im angegebenen Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6454">two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6455">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6455">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6456">zwei Buchstaben, gefolgt von sieben Zahlen mit Sonderzeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6456">two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6457">zwei Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6457">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6458">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6458">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6459">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6459">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6460">ein Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6460">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6461">eine Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6461">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6462">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6462">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6463">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6463">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6464">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6464">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6465">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6465">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6466">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6466">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6467">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6467">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6483">Portugiesische Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6483">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6484">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6484">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6485">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6485">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6486">ein Buchstabe, gefolgt von sechs Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6486">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6487">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6487">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6488">ein Buchstabe, gefolgt von sechs Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6488">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6489">ein Buchstabe (Groß-/Kleinschreibung wird nicht berücksichtigt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6489">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6490">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6490">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6491">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6492">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6492">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6493">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6494">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6494">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6495">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6495">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6496">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` oder `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6496">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6520">Portugiesische Steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6520">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6521">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6521">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6522">neun Ziffern mit optionalen Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6522">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6523">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6523">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6524">3 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6524">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6525">ein optionaler Raum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6525">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6526">3 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6526">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6527">ein optionaler Raum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6527">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6528">3 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6528">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6529">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6530">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6530">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6531">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6532">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6532">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6533">Die  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6533">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6534">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6534">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6535">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 65 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6535">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6536">Die  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6536">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6561">Rumänische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6561">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6562">Diese Typen Entität für vertrauliche Informationen ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp für den EU-Führerscheinnummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6562">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6563">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6563">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6564">ein Zeichen gefolgt von acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6564">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6565">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6565">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6566">ein Zeichen gefolgt von acht Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6566">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6567">ein Buchstabe (ohne Unterscheidung nach Groß-/Kleinschreibung) oder Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6567">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6568">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6568">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6569">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6570">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6570">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6571">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6572">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6572">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6573">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6573">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6574">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6574">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6590">Rumänischer persönlicher numerischer Code (CNP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6590">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6591">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6591">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6592">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6592">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6593">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6593">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6594">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6594">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6595">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6595">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6596">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6596">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6597">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6597">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6598">13 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6598">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6599">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6599">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6600">1 Digit from 1-9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6600">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6601">6 Stellen, die das Geburtsdatum darstellen (JJMMTT)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6601">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6602">2 Ziffern, die 01-52 oder 99 sein können</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6602">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6603">4 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6603">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6604">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6604">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6605">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6605">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6606">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6606">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6607">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6607">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6608">Die  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6608">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6609">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6609">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6610">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6610">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6611">Die  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6611">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6662">Rumänische Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6662">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6663">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6663">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6664">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6665">acht oder neun Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6665">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6666">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6667">acht oder neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6667">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6668">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6669">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6669">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6670">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6671">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6671">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6672">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6672">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6673">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` oder `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6673">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6674">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6674">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6675">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6675">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6688">Russische Passnummer Domestic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6688">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6689">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6689">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6690">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6690">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6691">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6691">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6692">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6692">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6693">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6693">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6694">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6694">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6695">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6696">zehnstellige Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6696">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6697">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6698">zehnstellige Zahl:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6698">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6699">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6699">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6700">ein optionales Leerzeichen oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6700">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6701">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6701">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6702">ein optionaler Raum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6702">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6703">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6703">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6704">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6705">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6705">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6706">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6707">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6707">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6708">Der Regex-Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6708">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6709">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6709">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6762">Saudi-Arabische Ausweisnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6762">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6763">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6763">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6764">zehn Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6764">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6765">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6765">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6766">zehn aufeinanderfolgende Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6766">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6767">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6767">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6768">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6768">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6769">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6769">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6770">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6770">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6771">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6771">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6772">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6772">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6779">Singapur nationale Registrierungs-Personalausweisnummer (NRIC)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6779">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6780">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6781">neun Buchstaben und Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6781">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6782">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6782">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6783">neun Buchstaben und Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6783">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6784">der Buchstabe "F", "G", "S" oder "T" (Groß-/Kleinschreibung wird nicht berücksichtigt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6784">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6785">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6785">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6786">eine alphabetische Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6786">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6787">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6788">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6788">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6789">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6790">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6790">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6791">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_singapore_nric findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6791">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6792">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_singapore_nric wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6792">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6793">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6793">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6794">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6794">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6795">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_singapore_nric findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6795">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6796">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6796">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6807">Slowakische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6807">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6808">Diese Typen Entität für vertrauliche Informationen ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp für den EU-Führerscheinnummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6808">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6809">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6809">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6810">ein Zeichen gefolgt von sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6810">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6811">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6811">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6812">ein Zeichen gefolgt von sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6812">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6813">ein Buchstabe (ohne Unterscheidung nach Groß-/Kleinschreibung) oder Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6813">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6814">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6814">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6815">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6815">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6816">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6816">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6817">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6817">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6818">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6818">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6819">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6819">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6820">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6820">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6836">Slowakische Personalnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6836">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6837">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6837">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6838">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6838">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6839">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6839">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6840">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6840">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6841">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6841">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6842">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6842">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6843">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6843">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6844">neun oder zehn Ziffern mit optionalem Backslash</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6844">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6845">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6845">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6846">6 Ziffern, die das Geburtsdatum darstellen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6846">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6847">Optionaler Schrägstrich (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6847">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6848">3 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6848">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6849">1 optionale Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6849">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6850">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6851">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6851">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6852">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6853">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6853">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6854">Die  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6854">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6855">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6855">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6856">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 65 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6856">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6857">Die  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6857">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6904">Slowakische Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6904">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6905">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6905">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6906">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6906">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6907">eine Ziffer oder ein Buchstabe, gefolgt von sieben Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6907">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6908">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6908">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6909">eine Ziffer oder ein Buchstabe (ohne Groß-/Kleinschreibung), gefolgt von sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6909">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6910">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6910">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6911">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6911">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6912">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6912">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6913">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6913">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6914">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6914">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6915">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` oder `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6915">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6934">Slowenische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6934">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6935">Diese Typen Entität für vertrauliche Informationen ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp für den EU-Führerscheinnummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6935">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6936">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6936">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6937">neun Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6937">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6938">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6938">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6939">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6939">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6940">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6941">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6941">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6942">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6943">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6943">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6944">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6944">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6945">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6945">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6961">Slowenien Unique Master Citizen Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6961">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6962">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6962">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6963">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6963">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6964">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6964">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6965">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6965">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6966">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6966">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6967">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6967">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6968">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6968">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6969">13 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6969">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6970">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6970">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6971">13 Ziffern im angegebenen Muster:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6971">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6972">sieben Ziffern, die dem Geburtsdatum (DDMMLLL) entsprechen, wobei "LLL" den letzten drei Ziffern des Geburtsjahres entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6972">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6973">zwei Ziffern, die dem Geburts Bereich "50" entsprechen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6973">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6974">drei Ziffern, die einer Kombination aus Geschlecht und Seriennummer für Personen entsprechen, die am selben Tag geboren wurden (000-499 für männliche und 500-999 für weiblich)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6974">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6975">eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6975">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6976">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6976">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6977">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6977">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6978">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6978">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6979">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6979">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6980">Die  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6980">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6981">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6981">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6982">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6982">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-6983">Die  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-6983">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7011">Slowenische Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7011">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7012">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7012">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7013">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7014">zwei Buchstaben, gefolgt von sieben Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7014">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7015">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7015">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7016">zwei Buchstaben, gefolgt von sieben Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7016">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7017">der Buchstabe "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7017">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7018">ein Großbuchstabe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7018">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7019">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7019">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7020">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7020">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7021">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7021">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7022">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7022">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7023">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7023">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7024">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7024">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7025">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` oder `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7025">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7045">Slowenische Steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7045">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7046">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7046">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7047">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7047">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7048">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7048">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7049">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7049">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7050">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7050">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7051">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7051">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7052">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7052">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7053">acht Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7053">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7054">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7054">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7055">eine Ziffer aus 1-9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7055">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7056">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7056">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7057">eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7057">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7058">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7058">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7059">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7059">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7060">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7060">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7061">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7061">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7062">Die  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7062">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7063">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7063">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7064">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 65 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7064">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7065">Die  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7065">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7089">Südafrikanische Identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7089">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7090">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7090">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7091">13 Ziffern, die Leerzeichen enthalten können</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7091">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7092">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7092">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7093">13 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7093">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7094">sechs Ziffern im Format jjmmtt, die das Geburtsdatum darstellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7094">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7095">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7095">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7096">ein einstelliger Staats Bürgerschafts Indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7096">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7097">die Ziffer "8" oder "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7097">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7098">eine Ziffer, die eine Prüfsummen Ziffer ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7098">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7099">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7099">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7100">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7100">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7101">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7101">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7102">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7102">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7103">Die Funktion Func_south_africa_identification_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7103">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7104">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_south_africa_identification_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7104">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7105">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7105">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7111">Südkorea ansässige Registrierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7111">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7112">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7112">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7113">13 Ziffern, die einen Bindestrich enthalten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7113">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7114">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7114">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7115">13 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7115">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7116">sechs Ziffern im Format jjmmtt, die das Geburtsdatum darstellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7116">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7117">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7117">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7118">eine Ziffer, die durch das Jahrhundert und das Geschlecht bestimmt wird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7118">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7119">vierstelliger Code für die Geburtsregion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7119">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7120">eine Ziffer zur Unterscheidung von Personen, für die die vorherigen Zahlen identisch sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7120">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7121">eine Prüfziffer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7121">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7122">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7122">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7123">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7123">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7124">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7124">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7125">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7125">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7126">Die Funktion Func_south_korea_resident_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7126">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7127">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_south_korea_resident_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7127">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7128">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7128">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7129">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7129">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7130">Die Funktion Func_south_korea_resident_number sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7130">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7131">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7131">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7137">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7137">RRN</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7139">Spanische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7139">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7140">Diese Typen Entität für vertrauliche Informationen ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp für den EU-Führerscheinnummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7140">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7141">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7141">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7142">acht Ziffern, gefolgt von einem Zeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7142">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7143">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7143">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7144">acht Ziffern, gefolgt von einem Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7144">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7145">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7145">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7146">eine Ziffer oder ein Buchstabe (ohne Berücksichtigung der Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7146">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7147">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7147">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7148">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7148">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7149">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7149">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7150">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7150">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7151">Die  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7151">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7152">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7152">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
