## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7189">Spanien DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7189">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7190">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7190">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7191">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7191">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7192">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7192">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7193">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7193">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7194">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7194">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7195">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7195">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7196">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7196">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7197">acht Ziffern, gefolgt von einem Zeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7197">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7198">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7198">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7199">sieben Ziffern, gefolgt von einem Zeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7199">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7200">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7200">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7201">Ein optionales Leerzeichen oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7201">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7202">ein Überprüfungs schreiben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7202">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7203">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7203">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7204">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7204">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7205">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7205">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7206">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7206">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7207">Die Funktion  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` oder `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7207">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7208">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7208">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7209">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7209">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7210">Die Funktion  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` oder `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7210">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7211">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7211">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7212">Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7212">Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7213">Carné de Identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7213">carné de identidad</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7214">DNI #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7214">dni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7215">DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7215">dni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7216">dninúmero #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7216">dninúmero#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7217">Documento Nacional de Identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7217">documento nacional de identidad</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7218">Identidad Único</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7218">identidad único</span></span>

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7234">Spanien Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7234">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7235">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7235">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7236">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7236">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7237">eine Kombination aus Buchstaben und Zahlen mit acht oder neun Zeichen ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7237">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7238">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7238">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7239">eine Kombination aus Buchstaben und Zahlen aus acht oder neun Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7239">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7240">zwei Ziffern oder Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7240">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7241">eine Ziffer oder ein Buchstabe (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7241">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7242">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7242">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7243">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7244">Nicht zutreffend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7244">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7245">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7246">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7246">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7247">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7247">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7248">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` oder `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7248">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7274">Spanien Sozialversicherungsnummer (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7274">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7275">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist in der Sozialversicherungsnummer der EU oder einem entsprechenden ID-vertraulichen Informationstyp enthalten und steht als eigenständige vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität zur Verfügung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7275">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7276">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7276">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7277">11-12 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7277">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7278">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7278">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7279">11-12 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7279">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7280">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7280">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7281">Schrägstrich (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7281">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7282">sieben bis acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7282">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7283">Schrägstrich (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7283">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7284">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7284">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7285">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7285">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7286">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7286">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7287">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7287">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7288">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7288">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7289">Die Funktion Func_spanish_social_security_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7289">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7290">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7290">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7291">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7291">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7292">Keine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7292">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7293">Spanien Steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7293">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7294">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7294">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7295">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7295">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7296">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7296">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7297">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7297">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7298">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7298">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7299">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7299">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7300">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7300">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7301">sieben oder acht Ziffern und ein oder zwei Buchstaben im angegebenen Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7301">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7302">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7302">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7303">Spanisch natürliche Personen mit einem nationalen spanischen Identitätsausweis:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7303">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7304">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7304">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7305">ein Großbuchstabe (Unterscheidung nach Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7305">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7306">Nicht-residente Spanier ohne einen nationalen Identitätsausweis in Spanien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7306">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7307">ein Großbuchstabe "L" (Unterscheidung nach Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7307">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7308">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7308">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7309">ein Großbuchstabe (Unterscheidung nach Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7309">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7310">Ansässige Spanier unter 14 Jahren ohne einen nationalen spanischen Identitätsausweis:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7310">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7311">ein Großbuchstabe "K" (Unterscheidung nach Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7311">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7312">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7312">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7313">ein Großbuchstabe (Unterscheidung nach Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7313">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7314">Ausländer mit Identifikationsnummer eines Ausländers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7314">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7315">ein Großbuchstabe mit "X", "Y" oder "Z" (Groß-/Kleinschreibung wird beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7315">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7316">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7316">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7317">ein Großbuchstabe (Unterscheidung nach Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7317">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7318">Ausländer ohne Identifikationsnummer eines Ausländers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7318">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7319">ein Großbuchstabe, der "M" ist (Groß-/Kleinschreibung beachten)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7319">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7320">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7320">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7321">ein Großbuchstabe (Unterscheidung nach Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7321">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7322">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7322">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7323">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7323">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7324">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7325">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7325">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7326">Die Funktion  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` oder `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7326">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7327">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7327">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7328">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7328">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7329">Die Funktion  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` oder `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7329">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7360">SQL Server Verbindungszeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7360">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7361">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7361">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7362">Die Zeichenfolge "Benutzer-ID", "Benutzer-ID", "UID" oder "UserID", gefolgt von den Zeichen und Zeichenfolgen, die im Muster unten dargestellt sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7362">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7363">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7363">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7364">die Zeichenfolge "Benutzer-ID", "Benutzer-ID", "UID" oder "UserID"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7364">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7365">eine beliebige Kombination von zwischen 1-200 unter-oder Großbuchstaben, Ziffern, Symbolen, Sonderzeichen oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7365">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7366">die Zeichenfolge "Password" oder "pwd", wobei "pwd" kein Kleinbuchstabe vorangestellt ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7366">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7367">ein Gleichheitszeichen (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7367">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7368">ein beliebiges Zeichen, das kein Dollarzeichen ($), Prozentzeichen (%), größer als das Symbol (>), Symbol (@), Anführungszeichen ("), Semikolon (;), linke geschweifte Klammer ([) oder linke Klammer ({) ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7368">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7369">eine beliebige Kombination von 7-128 Zeichen, die kein Semikolon sind (;), Schrägstrich (/) oder Anführungszeichen (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7369">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7370">ein Semikolon (;) oder Anführungszeichen (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7370">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7371">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7371">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7372">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7372">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7373">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7373">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7374">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7374">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7375">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7375">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7376">Ein Schlüsselwort aus CEP_GlobalFilter wurde **nicht** gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7376">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7377">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder findet **keine** Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7377">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7378">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_CommonExampleKeywords findet **keine** Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7378">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7379">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7379">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7381">Einige-Kennwort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7381">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7382">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7382">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7383">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7383">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7384">Beispiel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7384">sample</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7386">(Beachten Sie, dass dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp technisch diese Schlüsselwörter mit einem regulären Ausdruck und nicht mit einer Stichwortliste identifiziert.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7386">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7387">Password oder PWD gefolgt von 0-2 Leerzeichen, ein Gleichheitszeichen (=), 0-2 Leerzeichen und ein Sternchen (\*)--oder--</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7387">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7388">Password oder PWD gefolgt von:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7388">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7389">Gleichheitszeichen (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7389">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7390">Kleiner als-Symbol (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7390">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7391">Eine beliebige Kombination von 1-200 Zeichen mit groß-oder Kleinbuchstaben, Ziffern, einem Sternchen (\*), einem Bindestrich (-), einem Unterstrich (_) oder einem Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7391">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7392">Größer als-Symbol (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7392">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7393">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7393">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7394">(Beachten Sie, dass dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp technisch diese Schlüsselwörter mit einem regulären Ausdruck und nicht mit einer Stichwortliste identifiziert.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7394">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7406">Schwedische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7406">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7407">Diese Typen Entität für vertrauliche Informationen ist nur im vertraulichen Informationstyp für den EU-Führerscheinnummer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7407">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7408">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7408">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7409">zehn Ziffern mit einem Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7409">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7410">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7410">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7411">zehn Ziffern mit einem Bindestrich:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7411">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7412">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7412">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7413">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7413">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7414">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7414">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7415">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7416">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7416">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7417">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7418">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7418">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7419">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7419">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7420">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7420">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7421">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7421">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7422">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7422">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7423">DL #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7423">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7426">Treiber Lizenz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7426">driver licence</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7436">Schwedische National ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7436">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7437">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7437">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7438">zehn oder zwölf Ziffern und ein optionales Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7438">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7439">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7440">zehn oder zwölf Ziffern und ein optionales Trennzeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7440">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7441">zwei Ziffern (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7441">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7442">Sechs Ziffern im Datumsformat JJMMTT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7442">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7443">Trennzeichen für "-" oder "+" (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7443">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7444">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7444">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7445">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7445">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7446">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7446">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7447">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7447">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7448">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7448">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7449">Die `Func_swedish_national_identifier` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7449">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7450">Ein Schlüsselwort aus `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7450">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7451">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7451">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7452">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7452">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7453">Die `Func_swedish_national_identifier` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7453">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7454">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7454">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7473">Schwedische Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7473">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7474">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU-Passport-Nummer enthalten und steht als eigenständige vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität zur Verfügung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7474">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7475">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7476">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7476">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7477">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7478">acht aufeinanderfolgende Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7478">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7479">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7480">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7480">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7481">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7482">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7482">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7483">der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_sweden_passport_number findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7483">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7484">einer der folgenden Schritte ist zutreffend:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7484">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7485">ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_passport wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7485">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7486">ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_sweden_passport wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7486">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7517">Schwedische Sozialversicherungsnummer oder gleichwertige Identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7517">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7518">Diese vertrauliche Informationstyp Entität ist nur in der Sozialversicherungsnummer der EU oder einem entsprechenden ID-vertraulichen Informationstyp verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7518">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7519">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7519">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7520">12 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7520">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7521">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7521">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7522">12 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7522">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7523">acht Ziffern, die dem Geburtsdatum entsprechen (JJJJMMTT)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7523">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7524">drei Ziffern, die einer Seriennummer entsprechen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7524">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7525">die letzte Ziffer in der Seriennummer gibt das Geschlecht durch die Zuweisung einer ungeraden Zahl für männliche und eine gerade Zahl für weiblich an.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7525">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7526">bis zu 1990 entsprach die Zuordnung der Seriennummer dem Kreis, in dem der Inhaber der Nummer geboren wurde oder (sofern er vor 1947 geboren wurde), in dem er nach Steuerunterlagen am 1. Januar 1947 mit einem Sondercode (in der Regel 9 als siebte Ziffer) für Einwanderer gelebt hatte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7526">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7527">eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7527">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7528">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7528">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7529">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7529">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7530">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7530">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7531">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7531">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7532">Die  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7532">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7533">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7533">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7534">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7534">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7535">Die  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7535">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7551">Schwedische Steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7551">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7552">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7552">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7553">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7553">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7554">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7554">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7555">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7555">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7556">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7556">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7557">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7557">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7558">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7558">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7559">zehn Ziffern und ein Symbol im angegebenen Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7559">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7560">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7560">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7561">zehn Ziffern und ein Symbol:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7561">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7562">sechs Ziffern, die dem Geburtsdatum entsprechen (JJMMTT)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7562">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7563">Pluszeichen oder Minuszeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7563">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7564">drei Ziffern, die die Identifikationsnummer eindeutig machen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7564">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7565">für Zahlen, die vor 1990 ausgegeben wurden, identifizieren die siebte und die achte Ziffer den Geburts Kreis oder den in der fremde geborenen Personen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7565">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7566">die Ziffer in der neunten Position gibt das Geschlecht entweder ungerade für männliche oder sogar für weiblich an.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7566">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7567">eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7567">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7568">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7568">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7569">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7569">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7570">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7570">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7571">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7571">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7572">Die  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7572">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7573">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7573">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7574">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7574">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7575">Die  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7575">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7601">SWIFT-Codes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7601">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7602">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7602">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7603">vier Buchstaben, gefolgt von 5-31 Buchstaben oder Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7603">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7604">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7604">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7605">vier Buchstaben, gefolgt von 5-31 Buchstaben oder Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7605">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7606">Bankleitzahl mit vier Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7606">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7607">ein optionaler Raum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7607">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7608">4 bis 28 Buchstaben oder Ziffern (BBAN, Basic Bank Account Number)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7608">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7609">ein optionaler Raum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7609">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7610">ein bis drei Buchstaben oder Ziffern (Rest des BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7610">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7611">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7611">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7612">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7612">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7613">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7613">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7614">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7614">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7615">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_swift findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7615">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7616">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_swift wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7616">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7650">Schweiz SSN AHV-Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7650">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7651">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7651">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7652">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7652">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7653">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7653">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7654">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7654">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7655">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7655">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7656">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7656">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7657">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7657">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7658">13-stellige Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7658">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7659">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7659">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7660">13-stellige Zahl:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7660">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7661">drei Ziffern – 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7661">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7662">ein optionaler Punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7662">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7663">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7663">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7664">ein optionaler Punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7664">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7665">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7665">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7666">ein optionaler Punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7666">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7667">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7667">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7668">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7669">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7669">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7670">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7671">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7671">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7672">Die Funktion Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7672">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7673">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7673">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7674">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7674">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7675">Die Funktion Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7675">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7696">Taiwan nationale Identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7696">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7697">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7698">ein Buchstabe (in Englisch), gefolgt von neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7698">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7699">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7700">ein Buchstabe (in Englisch) gefolgt von neun Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7700">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7701">ein Buchstabe (in Englisch, keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7701">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7702">die Ziffer "1" oder "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7702">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7703">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7703">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7704">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7705">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7705">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7706">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7707">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7707">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7708">Die Funktion Func_taiwanese_national_id findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7708">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7709">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_taiwanese_national_id wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7709">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7710">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7710">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7711">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7711">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7712">Die Funktion Func_taiwanese_national_id findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7712">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7713">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7713">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7730">Taiwan Passport-Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7730">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7731">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7731">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7732">biometrische Passport-Nummer: neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7732">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7733">nicht biometrische Passport-Nummer: neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7733">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7734">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7734">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7735">biometrische Passnummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7735">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7736">das Zeichen "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7736">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7737">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7737">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7738">nicht biometrische Passnummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7738">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7739">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7739">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7740">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7740">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7741">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7741">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7742">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7742">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7743">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7743">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7744">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_taiwan_passport findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7744">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7745">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_taiwan_passport wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7745">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7756">Taiwan Resident Certificate (Arc/tarc)-Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7756">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7757">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7757">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7758">zehn Buchstaben und Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7758">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7759">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7759">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7760">zehn Buchstaben und Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7760">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7761">zwei Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7761">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7762">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7762">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7763">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7764">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7764">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7765">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7766">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7766">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7767">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7767">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7768">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7768">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7782">Thai-Populations Kennzeichnungscode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7782">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7783">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7783">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7784">13 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7784">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7785">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7785">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7786">13 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7786">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7787">die erste Ziffer ist nicht NULL oder neun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7787">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7788">12 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7788">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7789">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7790">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7790">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7791">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7792">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7792">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7793">Die Funktion Func_Thai_Citizen_Id sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7793">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7794">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7794">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7795">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7795">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7796">Die Funktion Func_Thai_Citizen_Id sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7796">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
