## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7805">Türkische nationale Identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7805">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7806">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7807">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7807">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7808">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7809">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7809">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7810">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7811">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7811">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7812">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7813">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7813">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7814">Die Funktion Func_Turkish_National_Id sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7814">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7815">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_Turkish_National_Id wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7815">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7816">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7816">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7817">Die Funktion Func_Turkish_National_Id sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7817">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7824">Britannien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7824">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7825">Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7825">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7826">Diese vertrauliche Informationen Typ Entität ist in der EU-Führerscheinnummer vertraulichen Informationstyp enthalten und ist als eigenständige vertrauliche Informationen Typ Entität zur Verfügung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7826">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7827">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7827">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7828">Kombination aus 18 Buchstaben und Ziffern im angegebenen Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7828">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7829">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7829">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7830">18 Buchstaben und Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7830">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7831">fünf Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet) oder die Ziffer "9" anstelle eines Buchstabens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7831">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7832">eine Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7832">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7833">fünf Ziffern im Datumsformat MMDDY für das Geburtsdatum (das siebte Zeichen wird um 50 erhöht, wenn der Fahrer weiblich ist, d. h. 51 bis 62 statt 01 bis 12).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7833">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7834">zwei Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet) oder die Ziffer "9" anstelle eines Buchstabens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7834">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7835">fünf Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7835">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7836">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7836">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7837">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7837">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7838">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7838">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7839">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7839">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7840">Die Funktion Func_uk_drivers_license findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7840">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7841">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_uk_drivers_license wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7841">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7842">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7842">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7860">Britannien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7860">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7861">Nummer der Wahl Rolle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7861">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7862">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7863">zwei Buchstaben, gefolgt von 1-4 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7863">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7864">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7865">zwei Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet) gefolgt von 1-4 Zahlen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7865">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7866">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7867">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7867">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7868">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7869">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7869">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7870">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_uk_electoral findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7870">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7871">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_uk_electoral wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7871">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7872">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7872">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7873">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7873">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7874">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7874">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7875">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7875">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7876">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7876">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7877">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7877">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7878">Britannien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7878">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7879">National Health Service-Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7879">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7880">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7881">10-17 Ziffern, durch Leerzeichen getrennt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7881">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7882">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7883">10 bis 17 Stellen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7883">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7884">entweder drei oder zehn Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7884">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7885">ein Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7885">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7886">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7886">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7887">ein Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7887">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7888">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7888">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7889">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7889">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7890">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7890">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7891">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7891">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7892">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7892">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7893">Die Funktion Func_uk_nhs_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7893">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7894">Eine der folgenden Bedingungen trifft zu:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7894">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7895">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_uk_nhs_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7895">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7896">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7896">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7897">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7897">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7898">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7898">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7899">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7899">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7900">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7900">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7901">national health service</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7901">national health service</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7902">NHS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7902">nhs</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7903">health services authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7903">health services authority</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7904">health authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7904">health authority</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number1"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7905">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7905">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7906">patient id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7906">patient id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7907">patient identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7907">patient identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7908">patient no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7908">patient no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7909">patient number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7909">patient number</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7910">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7910">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7911">GP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7911">GP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7912">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7912">DOB</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7913">D. O. B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7913">D.O.B</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7914">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7914">Date of Birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7915">Birth Date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7915">Birth Date</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7916">Britannien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7916">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7917">Nationale Versicherungsnummer (Nino)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7917">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7918">Diese vertrauliche Informationen Typ Entität ist in der EU-nationalen Identificaiton Nummer vertraulichen Informationstyp enthalten und ist als eigenständige vertrauliche Informationen Typ Entität verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7918">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7919">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7919">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7920">sieben oder neun Zeichen, getrennt durch Leerzeichen oder Bindestriche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7920">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7921">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7921">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7922">zwei mögliche Muster:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7922">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7923">zwei Buchstaben (gültige Ninos verwenden nur bestimmte Zeichen in diesem Präfix, die von diesem Muster überprüft werden; Groß-/Kleinschreibung wird nicht berücksichtigt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7923">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7924">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7924">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7925">entweder "A", "B", "C" oder "'d" (wie das Präfix sind nur bestimmte Zeichen im Suffix zulässig; Groß-/Kleinschreibung wird nicht berücksichtigt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7925">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7926">ODER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7926">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7927">zwei Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7927">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7928">ein Leerzeichen oder ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7928">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7929">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7929">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7930">ein Leerzeichen oder ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7930">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7931">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7931">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7932">ein Leerzeichen oder ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7932">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7933">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7933">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7934">ein Leerzeichen oder ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7934">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7935">entweder "A", "B", "C" oder "'d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7935">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7936">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7936">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7937">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7937">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7938">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7938">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7939">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7939">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7940">Die Funktion Func_uk_nino findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7940">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7941">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_uk_nino wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7941">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7942">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7942">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7943">Die Funktion Func_uk_nino findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7943">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7944">Es wurde kein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_uk_nino gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7944">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7966">Britannien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7966">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7967">Eindeutige Steuerzahler-Referenznummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7967">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7968">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7968">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7969">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7969">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7970">Kommunikations Konformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7970">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7971">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7971">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7972">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7972">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7973">Microsoft Cloud-App-Sicherheit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7973">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7974">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7975">10 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7975">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7976">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7976">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7977">10 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7977">10 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7979">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7979">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7980">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7981">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7981">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7982">Die  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` -Funktion sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7982">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-7983">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-7983">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8003">US-Bank Kontonummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8003">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8004">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8004">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8005">8-17 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8005">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8006">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8006">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8007">8-17 aufeinanderfolgende Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8007">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8008">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8008">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8009">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8009">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8010">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8010">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8011">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8011">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8012">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_usa_bank_account_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8012">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8013">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_usa_Bank_Account wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8013">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8043">US-Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8043">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8044">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8044">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8045">Abhängig vom Bundesstaat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8045">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8046">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8046">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8047">hängt vom Status ab--zum Beispiel New York:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8047">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8048">neun Ziffern, die wie DDD DDD DDD formatiert sind, stimmen überein.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8048">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8049">neun Ziffern wie ddddddddd werden nicht übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8049">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8050">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8050">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8051">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8051">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8052">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8052">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8053">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8053">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8054">Die Funktion Func_new_york_drivers_license_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8054">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8055">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8055">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8056">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_us_drivers_license wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8056">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8057">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 65 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8057">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8058">Die Funktion Func_new_york_drivers_license_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8058">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8059">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8059">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8060">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8060">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8061">Es wurde kein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_us_drivers_license gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8061">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8159">US-individuelle Steuerzahler-Identifikationsnummer (ITIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8159">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8160">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8160">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8161">neun Ziffern, die mit "9" beginnen und eine "7" oder "8" als vierte Ziffer enthalten, optional mit Leerzeichen oder Bindestrichen formatiert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8161">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8162">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8162">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8163">formatiert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8163">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8164">die Ziffer "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8164">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8165">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8165">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8166">ein Leerzeichen oder ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8166">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8167">a "7" oder "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8167">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8168">eine Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8168">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8169">ein Leerzeichen oder ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8169">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8170">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8170">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8171">unformatiert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8171">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8172">die Ziffer "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8172">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8173">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8173">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8174">a "7" oder "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8174">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8175">fünf Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8175">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8176">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8176">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8177">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8177">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8178">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8178">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8179">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8179">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8180">Die Funktion Func_formatted_itin findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8180">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8181">Mindestens eine der folgenden Bedingungen trifft zu:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8181">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8182">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_itin wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8182">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8183">Die Funktion Func_us_address findet eine Adresse im richtigen Format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8183">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8184">Die Funktion Func_us_date findet ein Datum im richtigen Datumsformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8184">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8185">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_itin_collaborative wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8185">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8186">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8186">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8187">Die Funktion Func_unformatted_itin findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8187">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8188">Mindestens eine der folgenden Bedingungen trifft zu:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8188">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8189">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_itin_collaborative wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8189">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8190">Die Funktion Func_us_address findet eine Adresse im richtigen Format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8190">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8191">Die Funktion Func_us_date findet ein Datum im richtigen Datumsformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8191">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8212">US-Sozialversicherungsnummer (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8212">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8213">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8213">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8214">neun Ziffern, die sich möglicherweise in einem formatierten oder unformatierten Muster befinden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8214">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8215">Wenn ein SSN vor Mitte 2011 ausgegeben wird, weist es eine starke Formatierung auf, bei der bestimmte Teile der Zahl in bestimmte Bereiche fallen müssen, um gültig zu sein (aber keine Prüfsumme).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8215">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8216">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8217">vier Funktionen suchen nach Sozialversicherungsnummern in vier verschiedenen Mustern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8217">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8218">Func_ssn findet Sozialversicherungsnummern mit starker Formatierung vor 2011, die mit Bindestrichen oder Leerzeichen formatiert sind (DDD-DD-dddd oder DDD DD dddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8218">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8219">Func_unformatted_ssn findet Sozialversicherungsnummern mit starker Formatierung vor 2011, die als neun aufeinanderfolgende Ziffern (ddddddddd) unformatiert sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8219">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8220">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn findet Post-2011-Sozialversicherungsnummern, die mit Bindestrichen oder Leerzeichen formatiert sind (DDD-DD-dddd oder DDD DD dddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8220">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8221">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn findet Post-2011 Sozialversicherungsnummern, die als neun aufeinanderfolgende Ziffern (ddddddddd) unformatiert sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8221">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8222">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8222">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8223">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8223">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8224">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8224">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8225">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 85 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8225">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8226">Die Funktion Func_ssn findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8226">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8227">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_ssn wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8227">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8228">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8228">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8229">Die Funktion Func_unformatted_ssn sucht nach Inhalten, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8229">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8230">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_ssn wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8230">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8231">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 65 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8231">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8232">Die Funktion Func_randomized_formatted_ssn findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8232">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8233">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_ssn wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8233">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8234">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 55 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8234">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8235">Die Funktion Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8235">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8236">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_ssn wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8236">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8257">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8257">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8262">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8262">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8263">Die Funktion Func_usa_uk_passport findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8263">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">

    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8286">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8286">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8295">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8295">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8296">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8296">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8297">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8297">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8298">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8298">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8299">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8299">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8300">Der Regex-Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8300">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8301">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8301">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8311">Dieser Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist nur für die Verwendung in verfügbar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8311">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8317">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8317">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8320">alphanumerisches Muster mit acht Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8320">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8325">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8325">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8326">Eine DLP-Richtlinie ist zu 75 % sicher, dass diese Art von vertraulichen Informationen erkannt wurde, wenn Folgendes innerhalb von 300 Zeichen zutrifft:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8326">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8327">Der Regex-Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International findet Inhalte, die mit dem Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8327">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9ca83-8328">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ca83-8328">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
